items.name: "Audacity of Janus" Torpedo Launchers
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} capable of firing 4 Aeldari sonic torpedoes with 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} warheads.
items.flavorText: The design of this exquisite weapon makes use of Aeldari mechanisms of war. Only a Rogue Trader can afford to possess a weapon that so outrageously disregards the laws of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

items.name: "Fangs of Janus" Macro-Weapons
items.description: Short-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 6 shots, dealing 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
items.flavorText: These weapons were created by daring artisans from mysterious Aeldari mechanisms of war discovered during excavations on Janus. Efforts to replicate their original design may have failed, but the ancient machines were nonetheless transformed into devastating rapid-fire weapons that are sure to bring the Imperium's wrath upon the wicked.

items.name: Abyss Spinner Gloves
items.description:
Allies targeted by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} gain +20% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +30% of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
If that ally scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer's next attack is always a critical hit.

items.name: Abyssal Conduit
items.description: Every second use of a psyker staff's unique {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} deals +{uip|Damage|b5ce0059e2f74fe8ac938a92125ac344} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Accelerator
items.description: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies adjacent, they gain +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

items.name: Accuser of Sin
items.description: The {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} against daemons and xenos.
items.flavorText: This venerable servo-skull was crafted out of the hollowed relics of the most exalted Brother Eclas, an implacable vanquisher of heresy on the world of Everharvest. It has accompanied many a zealous war commander of the faith, broadcasting sermons of vengeance and righteous hatred. The servo-skull's maglev unit has been out of order for centuries, but the rage of the Emperor is still very much alive in its vox-loudspeakers.

items.name: Acid Spitter
items.description:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, targets {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} by this webber suffer 10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Both effects last until the end of combat.
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Acrobat's Greaves
items.description: At the start of combat, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:48b5d7a82ab3411eae0449d06da0d821}acrobatic trick{/g} equal to their MP. These stacks can be used until the end of combat.

items.name: Adaptive Antidote
items.description: Grants immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} and inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Adaptive Flak Vest
items.description: This flak vest grants the wearer +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} at the beginning of every combat. During the first 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} deflection is reduced by −1 and armour by −5% at the end of each round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is more than 55.

items.name: Adaptive Gloves
items.description: Increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} by 10 and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by 10%.

items.description: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, they immediately gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to their missing wounds.

items.description: Restores {uip|Heal|489842740f8d45d4bd5f27c44a89fae1} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.

items.description: The wielder gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|ad7978b34be447128cf701768c03ab7f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

items.name: Aeldari Farseer Mesh Armour
items.description: The wearer's chances to suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} are reduced by −20%. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 70.

items.name: Aeldari Flexi-Armour
items.description: While in combat, the wearer is considered protected by partial {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} if their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 70, and by full cover instead if their Agility is more than 140.

items.name: Aeldari Plasma Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 10 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and blinds enemies for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −10 penalty.

items.name: Aeldari Rune Stone
items.description: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is reduced by −1.

items.description:

<indent=5%>Reload: 2 rounds</indent>

items.name: Aether Amulet
items.description:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to at least 2 enemies with one attack, they gain the effect of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s {g|f:c62c629dde5843a99a511997646a95f3}Elusive Shadow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
For 1 round, the Assassin becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains the {g|f:670419fc312d4ee2b2298d03af22e0c2}elusive{/g} effect, which lasts until the Assassin attacks.

items.name: Agonising Splinter Pistol
items.description: Deals double {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. Each successful attack with this weapon increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect suffered by a target by +1.

items.name: Alcedont Fur Cloak
items.description: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever they make a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their shield gains +2% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Alpha's Arc Rifle
items.description: Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this rifle suffer +{uip|Damage|1c8dbdedc0904ea7b47ba45a25ebbeab}% more damage from the wielder until the end of combat. Does not stack.

items.name: Amulet of the Indomitable Spirit
items.description: Once per battle, whenever the wearer's wounds drop to 0, they regain 20% of their maximum wounds.
items.flavorText: Such a trophy can only be worn by one who has fully comprehended an ancient truth — that in the universe there exists only war.

items.name: Amulet of the Ravenous Star
items.description: In the first round of combat, the wearer's MP is doubled.
items.flavorText: This amulet, in the shape of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs, once belonged to a Magus of the Genestealer Cult of the Ravenous Star.

items.name: Analyst's Helmet
items.description: When the wearer kills a target with an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} using a single or {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, the nearest enemy immediately gains 1 exploit.

items.name: Anatomist's Amulet
items.description: If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.

items.name: Anatomy Tome
items.description:
The wielder gains a +{uip|Damage|b67efdd04d5448818993ca01bee44b79} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for single attacks against human enemies.
It also grants a +5 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}.

items.name: Ancient Force Sword
items.description:
Whenever the wielder suffers energy, fire, power, or warp damage, this sword absorbs a part of that damage, reducing it by −{uip|Damage|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}%. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|3ccf46b177184d7b886568fa5451c43b}% armour penetration for their next attack. Stacks.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Ancient Plasma Rifle
items.description: Deals an additional +{uip|Damage|84a4c46311654f5083208b6eedfa09fe} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Ancient Terra Monocle
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} depend on {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.

items.name: Ancient Xenomechanism
items.description:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|fc9359c915704579a71f3591fea4c2de} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} (with {unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence} {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}) to all adjacent creatures.
If the number of damaged creatures exceeds 3, the wearer suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} effect.
items.flavorText: A trophy claimed for the Rogue Trader on Vheabos VI, when the planet's denizens faced an enigmatic and pitiless xenos sorcerer.

items.name: Annihilating Astartes Bolter
items.description: Each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this bolter increases {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +10% until the end of combat.
items.flavorText: A favoured weapon of the Adeptus Astartes.

items.name: Anti-Vehicle Revolver
items.description: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, the shot explodes, dealing 20 {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to everyone in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} around the target.

items.name: Antitank Shell
items.description: This shell is specially designed to be used against heavily armoured vehicles.

items.name: Antitoxin
items.description: Gives immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} until the end combat.

items.name: Anver Chainsword
items.description: When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon, the target suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Apex Predator's Gloves
items.description: If the wearer has already gained a bonus from {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}, whenever they kill a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stacking bonus from this ability once again. That bonus duplicates the highest tier bonus from {g|f:b97c9e76f6ca46d3bb8ccd86baa9d7c9}Hunt Down the Prey{/g} that the wearer has already gained.

items.name: Apexalium Stimulant
items.description: Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and inflicts a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 rounds.
items.flavorText: Combat-purposed medication that enhances a fighter's physical condition to peak performance values, while adversely affecting their mental state.

items.name: Apostate Lance
items.description: A medium ranged light {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 40 to 48)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Aquila Pendant
items.description:
Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}, they also gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.

items.name: Arbites Handcuffs
items.description: Once per combat, these specially crafted handcuffs allow the wearer to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} effect on adjacent enemy for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Arbites Underarm Foehammer
items.description: When the wielder kills the target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +1 free ranged attack from this weapon until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Arbitrator Solomon Vhyr's Armour
items.description: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a human enemy, that enemy gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Base armour property: +{uip|Deflection|43e0cceb9a584c938bf68300a2c4ccf6} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
items.flavorText: This armour once belonged to Solomon Vhyr of the Adeptus Arbites. While pursuing the head of a major crime syndicate, Plavius Kolt, Vhyr went beyond the bounds of the Calixis Sector and his own jurisdiction. Outnumbered, he was felled by the criminal and his henchmen but took them all out with him. His armour was kept in the reliquary of the Koronus Expanse division of the Administratum.

items.name: Arbitrator's Signal Ring
items.description: Whenever {g|f:78e7771b7c974111887e762d5e999a11}Protect!{/g} is used on the Rogue Trader, the Overseer regains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff's attacks against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target are triggered by the Rogue Trader's attacks too.

items.name: Arc Rifle Mindstorm
items.description: Deals +{uip|Damage|12268145c253474cb0ff40f2329b3355} more base damage.

items.name: Arch-Militant's Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} after a ranged attack, the target of the melee attack must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

items.name: Arch-Militant's Cape
items.description: Each of the wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} made with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} increases their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} until the end of combat.

items.name: Arch-Strategist's Mantle
items.description: All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas are increased by +5% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} different from the one used before, or if none were used before it. This effect does not stack.

items.name: Arch-Strategist's Visor
items.description: The wearer gains an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g}: all allies in the target {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area instantly {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} their weapons after each attack made by them until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}

items.name: Archeotech Fusion Gun
items.description: Deals an additional +60% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} enemies.

items.name: Archeotech Glimmer-Pattern Void Shield Array
items.description: Provides 140 points of protection for each sector. This amount is doubled against enemy blast attacks.

items.name: Archeotech Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Archeotech Macro Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 27 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Archeotech Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 39 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Archivist Servo-Skull
items.flavorText: This servo-skull is designed to spread the glory and splendour of its mighty owner.

items.name: Archmachinator's Deceit
items.description:
Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
Valid attack types are: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} attack (single-target or {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}), area melee, area ranged, or ranged burst.

items.name: Armour of Despair
items.description: All enemies in combat suffer −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against human enemies.

items.name: Armour of Hidden Promise
items.description: When making an attack, the wearer gains +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} they have right before that attack (up to a maximum of +30 Agility). This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks and lasts until the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Armour of Iron Will
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, all adjacent creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

items.name: Armour of Refraction
items.description: This carapace grants the wearer +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer has moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +2 deflection against human enemies.
items.flavorText: Carapace armour whose plates conceal miniature refractor generators that dissipate the energy of impacts. Blueprints for these generators are not contained in the catalogues of the Adeptus Mechanicus.

items.name: Armour of the Dawn Shadow
items.description: The wearer gains +70% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After each attack against the wearer that can be dodged, this value is reduced by −10%.

items.name: Armour of the Final Threshold
items.description: While the wearer has 75% or more {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +3 and their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} is increased by +{uip|Coercion|55627a193f5d4c3dbc05ab165c470b6c}%. Base armour property: +1 deflection against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

items.name: Armour of the Undaunted
items.description: All the wearer's attacking {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more but gain +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|316d01893b674779a75f89b5de397d88}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Armour-Piercing Ammo
items.description: The wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shots{/g} reduce the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by <u>{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt</u>.

items.name: Arsonist's Bracers
items.description: These bracers grant the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} and increase the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from flame weapons by +3.

items.name: Aspect Torpedo Tubes
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} capable of firing 5 neutron torpedoes per {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salvo{/g}.
<indent=5%>Reload: 1 round</indent>

items.name: Assassin's Pistol
items.description: This pistol deals double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to adjacent enemies.

items.name: Assault Armour
items.description: Whenever the wearer starts their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with no enemies in a 3-cell radius, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} this turn. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer starts their turn with at least 1 enemy within a 3-cell radius.

items.name: Assault Cloak
items.description: After the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they gain +5% dodge reduction and parry reduction for each target affected by that attack, for the next melee attack.

items.name: Assault Lasgun
items.description: Every {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1. Stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: Assault Lasgun
items.description: Every {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1. Stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: Astartes Bolter
items.flavorText: A favoured weapon of the Adeptus Astartes.

items.name: Astartes Chainaxe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Astartes Chainsword
items.description: This chainsword grants +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

items.name: Astartes Chainsword
items.description: This chainsword grants +10% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.

items.name: Astartes Combat Knife
items.description: If an attack with this knife kills the target, the wielder restores +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can make an additional attack with this knife.

items.name: Astartes Flamer
items.description: Flame weapons have 2 special area attacks with different areas of effect.

items.name: Astartes Power Boots
items.description: The {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and deals an additional +{uip|Damage|437b8247ae98465491ab35193f77e47d} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Astartes Power Gloves
items.description: The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is decreased by −{uip|Recoil|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944}. The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} also apply {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} on the targets if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|d179b36dff70467f814ebbe653853944} penalty.

items.name: Astartes Power Sword
items.description: The wielder can only perform area attacks with this weapon. These attacks cost −1 AP less and deal 0 damage to the wielder's allies.

items.name: Astartes Typhoon Bolter
items.description: Using the {g|f:d42db343de7e4b08a3ea0d7bc36af41f}Rapid Fire{/g} ability increases this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} by +17.
items.flavorText: A favoured weapon of the Adeptus Astartes.

items.name: Astral Currents
items.description:
In the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat, the wearer gains the following benefits:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement cost is not affected by threatened areas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wearer's movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Astronomican Regalia
items.description: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Augmented Gloves
items.description: Grants the wearer +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Auspex
items.description: Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}.

items.name: Auto Stimulant
items.description:
The wearer gains immunity to effects depending on the number of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} stacks:
-<indent=5%>6 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>9 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>12 or more stacks: immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.</indent>
The wearer gains all previous immunities.

items.name: Auto-Striking Power Sword
items.description:
When the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} with this power sword, they immediately counter-attack with whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to parry.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this power sword, the target suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Autocannon Fire
items.description: A bow-mounted ball turret armed with autocannons.

items.name: Autogun
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Autogun
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Autogun
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Autogun
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Avenger Gauntlets
items.description: All {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Avenger Tactical Gauntlets
items.description: Whenever an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} is performed against the wearer, the wearer gains +1 stack of the vengeance effect. Vengeance: the character's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each stack of the effect.

items.name: Awakened Nightmare
items.description:
Each area attack made with this weapon increases veil degradation by +{uip|Range|d1bd880bf4944374aefe0fe6ce5082dd} and deals +{uip|Damage|d1bd880bf4944374aefe0fe6ce5082dd}% more damage.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Backpack With Armour-Piercing Ammo
items.description: The wearer's ranged attacks inflict {uip|Bleed|eaed3890d0204c0f844cca89fc0cfa96} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} on their targets.

items.name: Bag with Stimulants
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:e5874ecd259b4878bc71239c281c17e4}Carnival of Misery{/g}, they immediately heal to full.

items.name: Balanced Maul
items.description:
This maul's {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Harsh Shove{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, costing 2 AP, against multiple enemies in an area.
items.flavorText: An extremely heavy power maul. Its handle is covered in litanies of fury spurring the wielder to exterminate the enemies of Humanity without mercy.

items.name: Bane of Sorrow
items.description: This rifle deals an additional +33% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Drukhari enemies.

items.name: Barrage-Type Flak Shot
items.description: Fires 4 flak shots each dealing 15 damage to targets in a 3×3 area.

items.name: Battle Plan
items.description: When the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, they and their allies increase their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Battle Stimulator Medikit
items.description:
-<indent=5%>Restores {uip|Heal|dd2e9a6170b448d4b2ec5a7fe0321e65} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Contains battle stimulators that grant +20 Strength for 3 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the character has the {g|f:91932ac8a5794d5cb9ed539bf7d528a2}Combat Medicae{/g} or {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.</indent>

items.name: Battle-Psyker Boots
items.description: The wearer gains {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each enemy affected by their psy-power or psyker staff attack. Stacks.

items.name: Battle-Scarred Cape
items.description: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g} from themselves and all adjacent allies. The wearer gains +{uip|THP|1d0faee48d084334aff1c4f05542bb9d} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each negative effect removed that way.

items.name: Battle-Scarred Mantle
items.description: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

items.name: Bayonet Chain Knife
items.description: When the wearer attacks a target with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} in a 1-cell range, that attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10). The target also suffers +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks made against it.

items.name: Bayonet Knife
items.description: When the wielder attacks with any {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} at a 1-cell range, that attack also inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

items.name: Bead of Concentration
items.description: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} for each consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} that the wearer has not moved. Stacks up to 5 times.

items.name: Bead of Might
items.description: If the wearer has 8 or more {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the rest of the combat.

items.name: Bedlam
items.description: The user's attacks deal an additional +{uip|Damage|5433415371084b559e028fb201b83b9d} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} until the end of the turn. This turn, each of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} attacks triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

items.name: Beggar's Weapon
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
items.flavorText: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

items.name: BG-15 Assault Scanners
items.description: Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 80% hit chance and 15% critical hit chance.

items.name: Bio-Dagger
items.description: Each attack with this dagger increases its damage by +1 until the end of the combat. Stacks.

items.name: Biomancer's Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 6) gains the Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Biometric Goggles
items.description: The target of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that attack. But if this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, it deals +30% more critical damage and gains +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Black Signet of the Inquisition
items.description: The wearer gains +40 Persuasion and the {g|f:abb46b314481406ca361e9984872e001}Inquisitor's Tenet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability can only be used once per combat.
items.flavorText: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

items.name: Blackhaze Venom Blade
items.description: Attacks against targets suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} apply the toxin effect with the same power to all enemies within a 2-cell radius of the target.

items.name: Blade of Sorrow
items.description: This blade can only perform area attacks. Attacks of opportunity performed with it are also area attacks.

items.name: Blade of the Blood Hunter
items.description: This weapon has {uip|Pen|2494b9c8d26d490d944c146a7245db55}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Blade of the Suffering Collector
items.description: The target suffers this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect and +3 levels of toxin for each other type of damage-over-time effect it is currently suffering.

items.name: Bladed Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} with the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, or {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) on the target.

items.name: Bladedancer's Bracers
items.description: Each hit made with {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} increases the wearer's critical hit chance by +{uip|Critchance|65815f9b334c476ba63a4790e85cf1de}% until the end of the wearer's turn.

items.name: Bladedancer's Greaves
items.description: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer −50% MP less.

items.name: Bladedancer's Light Greaves
items.description: Moving through cells affected by {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} or {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g} costs the wearer 0 MP.

items.name: Bladedancer's Mantle
items.description: {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} deals an additional +{uip|Damage|f08821bffc3b4437953bbb6aeb86cff5} mental damage.

items.name: Blades Clone Field
items.description:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can re-roll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can re-roll the parry test twice.

items.name: Bladewings
items.description:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

items.name: Bladewings
items.description:
The wearer can spend all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} to move to any cell within movement range.
This movement does not trigger {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
At the end of movement, the wearer automatically performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} with their primary weapon against all adjacent enemies.

items.name: Blast Pistol
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Blast Wave
items.description: Shots from this shotgun {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} targets 3 cells away even if the shot misses.

items.name: Blaster
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Blaster
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Blaster
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Bleeder Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Bleeder Splinter Pistol
items.description: This pistol is equipped with an unusual serum that thins the blood, inflicting {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (6).

items.name: Blessed Bolter Casing
items.description: Single attacks with bolter weapons automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the target.

items.name: Blessed Cape
items.description: Increases {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against daemon enemies by +2. If the wearer has the {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}, the damage is increased by +4 instead.

items.name: Blessed Lamp of Petrakara
items.description: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, inflicts the {g|f:bcce07e5964c409f9708c87306e2413e}light of Petrakara{/g} effect for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
items.flavorText: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

items.name: Blessing of Death
items.description: An attack with this weapon deals +{uip|Damage|0f41b613afe24784af011bb8bd400cfc}% more damage to targets at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Blessing of the Warp Spider
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
items.flavorText: An ancient Aeldari device that shrouds its wearer in a veil of small warp wind gusts. It has been theorised that it uses the same principle as the armour of the sinister Warp Spider warriors, minus the high-capacity power batteries. Instead, it senses and absorbs the energy of psychic suffering from its surroundings.

items.name: Blinding Grenade
items.description: This grenade blinds all enemies within the area for 2 turns if they fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Enemies which succeed upon that Toughness test become {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 turns.

items.name: Blitz Boots
items.description:
The wearer gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies who have no adjacent allies. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack.
Also, the range of the wearer's {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} and {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} is increased by +1 cell.

items.name: Blood Barrier Emitter
items.description: At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer recovers {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the number of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} creatures. If at least 1 wound was recovered that way, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g} is removed from the wearer as well.

items.name: Blood Fury Cloak
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

items.name: Blood Ice Gauntlets
items.description: The Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is reduced to 0. Targets of the Space Marine's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} suffer {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

items.name: Blood Phial
items.description: Creates a pool of blood which has the same properties as if created with the {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} ability. Whenever {g|f:e299c13f2278479bbd4e23269af5657c}Raining Blood{/g} is used, +1 charge of blood phial is restored.

items.name: Bloodblight Hexrifle
items.description: Attacks of this rifle inflict the bloodblight effect on the target. Bloodblight: at the beginning of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} all creatures in a 2-cell radius suffer the bloodblight effect. If these creatures suffer impact, piercing, or {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, they also suffer an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

items.name: Bloodburner
items.description: Every hit from this pistol increases the level of damage-over-time effects suffered by the target by +5. Does not stack.

items.name: Bloodcraver
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they regain {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 10% of their missing wounds. Base armour property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
items.flavorText: The magnificent armour is covered in hexagrammic wards, and the helmet's visors are carved with microrunes invoking the beneficence of the spirits of the hunt. Any blood shed by the wearer of this sacred armour will not be in vain — beneath the ceramite shell is an ingenious mechanism that collects every blessed drop of crimson, so that it can later serve as the basis for a Rune Priest's healing balms and sacred potions.

items.name: Blooddrinker
items.description: Whenever the wearer makes a melee attack, they regain +1 wound.
items.flavorText: The blood of those whose names the Undying Emperor has whispered strengthens His servant's body and spirit. This ring embodies that dogma.

items.name: Blooddrinker Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff gains Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} at power level 13. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heroic Act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Desperate Measure{/g} versions. The power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. In combat, the psyker wielding the staff suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. The bleeding damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is equal to the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +2 psy rating

items.name: Bloodhound Staff
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Bloodseeker Klaive
items.description: When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Each {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −5. Stacks.

items.name: Bloody Mentor
items.description: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

items.name: Bloody Pact
items.description: This knife grants its wielder a special ability called {g|f:2f680a6d85ef4ed9b48aa71532d3c9f8}Crimson Rage{/g}.

items.name: Bloody Retribution
items.description: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Bloody Sacrament
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Area attacks{/g} with this maul create a smoke cloud. All creatures that enter that area must pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|0eaf58bc6d7d487e8b78c6a2c31bd2fb} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>

items.name: Bloody Vigil
items.description: The first {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, or {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g} from this weapon per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains an additional +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|08e2ca4d59134bb58ca1e5fa7221eb58}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
items.flavorText: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

items.name: Bolstering Resolve
items.description: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this power axe increases the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} of its wielder by +5 until the end of combat.

items.name: Bombers Deck (Starhawk Bombers)
items.description: Allows Starhawk Bombers to be launched through torpedo tubes. A Starhawk Bomber wing consists of 4 attack craft, each equipped with 2 plasma bomb salvos. ! Can only be used with {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g} mounted on the {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}. ! Only 1 wing of Starhawk Bombers can be active at a time.

items.name: Bone-Shatterer
items.description: All types of {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this shotgun pistol are increased by +33% for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Bonebreaker Maul
items.description: When you {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} an enemy with the bonebreaker maul, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and gain random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

items.name: Bonecracker
items.description: Every successful basic attack made with this mace inflicts a random trauma on the target.

items.name: Book of Minor Prayers
items.description:
The wearer cannot use psychic or Navigator powers.
The wearer gains a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}{uip|Bonus|6a315c802f504015adf47aedb80c8cdd}{/g}% chance to ignore damage from psychic and Navigator powers.
items.flavorText: A compact collection of prayers and litanies which once belonged to a member of a minor cult on Dargonus.

items.name: Book of War Prayers
items.description: The wearer deals +10% more damage to xenos and daemons. If the wearer has Conviction — Dogmatic, this bonus is doubled.

items.name: Boots of Decay
items.description: Each time the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all enemies in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} lose 30% of their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Boots of Kasrkin
items.description:
When in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the wearer has 100% cover efficiency against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} but never {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} them. Also, they suffer −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area attacks.
Whenever the wearer uses a grenade and it {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} at least 3 enemies at once for the first time in combat, this action does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Boots of Silence
items.description: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and gain immunity to the forced movement effects until the end of the wearer's next turn.

items.name: Bounty Hunter's Gloves
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a +<u>prey's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

items.name: Breacher Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer gains the {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to use until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Breacher's Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|88c4c2fedc84403796580d7e85a03c7d}% armour. Extra property: +10 Perception.

items.name: Breacher's Bracers
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target, the wearer's next attack against that target in the same round deals +10% damage. Stacks.

items.name: Breath of Purgation
items.description: For each target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this flamer's attack, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by this flamer's attacks is increased by +3 until the end of combat.

items.name: Breezecatcher Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer moves through a cell occupied by an enemy, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against that enemy's attacks until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Brinkwalker Pendant
items.description: The wearer can move without provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} as long as they have less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.

items.name: Bruiser Boots
items.description:
Whenever the wearer performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they instantly provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from all adjacent enemies.
The wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} for each attack of opportunity provoked by an area attack.

items.name: Burden of Servitude
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more. After firing a burst attack, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks with this bolt pistol gain +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks.

items.name: Burning Blood Talisman
items.description:
This talisman grants the wearer +{uip|Bonus|55a4110aae8e441ba109656270a005fb}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} but reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} by −30.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary, they do not suffer the Fellowship penalty from the talisman and gains an additional +{uip|Bonus|55a4110aae8e441ba109656270a005fb}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against humans.

items.name: Burning Faith Insignia
items.description: The wearer's first melta weapon reload in a round costs 0 AP. The wearer's first melta weapon attack in combat does not count toward the attack limit per turn.
items.flavorText: This insignia is made of an expensive alloy, heavy as the gaze of a true believer.

items.name: Burnt Aquila Pendant
Bygone Sorrow
items.description: If the {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} has 8 or more stacks of {g|f:DeathCultAssassin_Bloodstained_AllyBuff}bloodblessed{/g}, they gain +1 AP and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack per turn{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

items.name: Cadian Castellan Carapace
items.description: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Zealot The wearer cannot fail any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} while in combat. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer's Toughness is more than 70.

items.name: Caligae of Saint Keefe
items.description: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they recover all their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
items.flavorText: In these blessed shoes, the ascetic Nicomedes Keefe walked on dozens of worlds, treading dusty roads and pulling a vox-wagon proclaiming the exalted Truth behind him.

items.name: Camaraderie Badge
items.description: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Note: temporary wounds granted by this item do not stack.

items.name: Cameleoline Cloak
items.description: Mimic fibres blend the colouration of the wearer into their surroundings. The cloak grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Camo Cloak
items.description: While the wearer is adjacent to {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance is calculated without considering enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} value.

items.name: Camouflage Robe
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} decrease their targets' {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −5%. Does not stack.

items.name: Cape of Reckoning
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
Every time an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the wearer, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against that enemy. Against daemons or xenos this bonus is multiplied by the wearer's <u>Dogmatic rank</u>.

items.name: Cape of Righteous Fury
items.description: For every kill, the wearer increases their critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +5% until the end of combat.

items.name: Carapace Fragment
items.description: This item negates all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the wearer, but it cannot occur more than 3 times per combat.
items.flavorText: This object came from the body of one of the mysterious xenocreatures, hordes of which emerged from the depths on Vheabos VI and swarmed the planet for a brief period of time.

items.name: Carapace of Sorrows
items.description: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.
items.flavorText: Drukhari carapace armour remoulded for the mon-keigh frame. A built-in agoniser sends carefully calibrated pain impulses to the wearer's nervous system, stimulating the spinal cord and enhancing reflexes.

items.name: Carmine Crown
items.description: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect inflicted by the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers a −5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penalty against only the wearer's attacks, and the wearer gains +5% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against them. Stacks.

items.name: Carmine Dancer
items.description: Grants +50% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.

items.name: Carnage
items.description: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this axe increases the {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} of this axe by 25% until the end of combat.

items.name: Carnivorous Blade
items.description: This weapon deals +3% damage for each 1% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Cassia's Gift
items.description: As long as Cassia remains in the party, this amulet grants both the Rogue Trader and Cassia +<u>(Cassia's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.
items.flavorText: This precious pendant on a fine chain can only be opened if one is familiar with its secret mechanism. Inside are painted portraits of Lady Cassia and the Rogue Trader, and on its back is an engraving that reads, "Never Fade."

items.name: Celestial Eye
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}
The wearer gains +{uip|Veil Tear|4872ff5c18b14a579b66ddea5abfba84}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and deals +{uip|Veil Tear|4872ff5c18b14a579b66ddea5abfba84}% more {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
items.flavorText: The pupil of the eye hollowed out of the thassertium surface looks unfathomably deep. Whichever way the amulet faces, its gaze seems to follow you.

items.name: Ceramite Storm Trooper Carapace
items.description: Base armour property: +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against human enemies.

items.name: Ceramite Xenochestplate
items.description: Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|517d87082d9c4bfbb202bbf398722dbf}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Ceremonial Blade
items.description: This blade has a special attack called {g|f:8ee5002b220a42249cd6e0ecd416d451}Ritual Cut{/g}.

items.name: Chain of Crystals
items.description:
Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon or a psyker for the first time in combat, the target suffers −{uip|Debuff|eaf13a1c39ee4d4a9e52ab9a195680a3} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and −1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

items.name: Chainaxe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Chainaxe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Chainaxe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Chains of Domination
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, they receive a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Chant of Stagnation
items.description: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

items.name: Chaos Bodyglove
items.description: Grants +15% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to any psyker or Navigator power. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against non-daemons.

items.name: Charged Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Lightning Arc {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Charm of Bonded Souls
items.description: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary Whenever the wearer's ally suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the bonded souls effect until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Bonded Souls: the wearer gains a +2% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage for each stack of bonded souls.

items.name: Chartist's Monocle
items.description: This monocle grants the wearer a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.

items.name: Chartist's Pendant
items.description:
The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent or above, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} will depend on Fellowship instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and they gain +10 Lore (Imperium).

items.name: Cherub
items.flavorText: An artificial bio-mechanical creation of the Magos Biologis Tech-Priests. Based on their uploaded doctrines, cherubs can perform various menial tasks for their masters.

items.name: Chirurgeon Medikit
items.description:
-<indent=5%>Restores {uip|Heal|ededbc48a7f24738a0fdb708fc48bb4c} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Effectively removes {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g}.</indent>
items.flavorText: An expanded version of the ordinary medicae kit, this set of high-grade medical instruments and medicaments is intended for a skilful healer accompanying a person of high standing.

items.name: Chirurgeon's Boots
items.description: At the beginning of combat, the wearer gets the {g|f:083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273}Medikit{/g} and {g|f:b6daa597bb6b5114bb9e21ea1e855792}Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, which reproduce the effect of the medikit and onslaught consumables, costing 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Each of these abilities can only be used once per combat.

items.name: Chirurgeon's Manual
items.description:
This manual grants the owner +{uip|Bonus|335b5f2e8a654604b2d279e91c5e54c5} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}.
It also grants +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} after using a medikit.

items.name: Chirurgeon's Vow
items.description: The wearer's Toughness is increased by +{uip|Bonus|262b2ce26d8748719dc49e0537d8112a}.

items.name: Chorus of Battle
items.description: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, all their allies adjacent to the target make an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against it.

items.name: Cinder
items.description: Single target attack only. Ignores 7 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

items.name: Claws of the Black Hunt
items.description:
Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} on an enemy, that attack inflicts +1 stack of the black hunt effect.
If an enemy has at least 1 stack of black hunt, each attack from an ally on that enemy inflicts 1 more stack of black hunt.
Each stack of black hunt grants +1% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +1% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to all attacks against that creature.

items.name: Cloak of Bloodthirst
items.description: If the wearer's target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, the wearer's melee attacks deal an additional +2% damage for each point of the target's Agility bonus.

items.name: Cloak of Hatred
items.description: Each enemy killed by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by +3% until the end of combat.

items.name: Cloak of Mercy
items.description: The wearer's {g|f:e8164ac219f44e69b95de4853569da3b}Lidless Stare{/g} ability no longer deals damage to the affected allies. Instead, those allies gain {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} temporary wounds.
items.flavorText: This cloak made of expensive fabric is adorned with purity seals bearing prayers of salvation for the righteous.

items.name: Cloak of Retribution
items.description: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Cloak of Shadows
items.description: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

items.name: Cloaking Field Emitter
items.description: When the wearer moves one of their {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas, the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} granted by this area are doubled.

items.name: Coffinmaker's Sledge
items.description: This weapon's single-target attacks deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to <u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}</u> (up to a maximum of 300).

items.name: Cogni-Simulacrum EF-Ultima-Octodecimum
items.description:
Grants +25 Logic.
The wearer gains the {g|f:0e0b90e4819343358b6d884df098b614}Solve Simulacrum{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can grant the wearer a permanent {g|f:29fee5bdb6aa49e78eff4fd250c0a555}Paradox Solved{/g} feature.
items.flavorText: A micro cogitator built from schematics bestowed upon the Rogue Trader by the blessed Null Caliph. The cogitator is locked in the never-ending cycle of calculating Paradox EF-Ultima-Octodecimum, whose essence is unfathomable to laypeople. The very process of meditating on this paradox allows the thinker to solve dilemmas that would otherwise require the combined computational rituals of a dozen Magi.

items.name: Cold Blooded
items.description: This blade has an additional attack called {g|f:ca399340605f44899dadca4efa5422d4}Double-Edged Strike{/g}.

items.name: Colossal Cleaver
Combat Manipulator
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses a non-attacking consumable item (e.g. stimulant, medikit, etc.), it counts as an attack of a different type than the previous attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}.

items.name: Combat Pleasure Stimulant
items.description: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

items.name: Combat Shotgun
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Combi-Tool
items.description: Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

items.name: Commander Cloak
items.description: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by +1 cell.

items.name: Commander's Chrono
items.description: The wearer always has the highest {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} in combat.

items.name: Commander's Gloves
items.description: At the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wearer gains stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} equal to the number of enemies they {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} during their turn.

items.name: Commander's Monocle
items.description: Whenever an ally under the effect of the wearer's {g|f:9c78e44bf8ff44a9afff8370c673c9ad}Voice of Command{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} makes an attack during an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, this attack deals an additional +{uip|Damage|738f084d21874705b18c1b844224d401}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Commander's Notes
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.

items.name: Commander's Visor
items.description: An ally under the effect of the wearer's {g|f:36cb9c507ede4953b22cefac9263aa4d}Break Their Ranks!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each enemy adjacent to this ally.

items.name: Commissar Boots
items.description:
Whenever the wearer chooses an ally as the target of their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +{uip|SelfMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
The targeted ally gains +{uip|AllyMP|6e3b70f210d24bcf8c87db1890023ac5} MP at the start of this ally's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Commissar Cap
items.description: Grants the wearer +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. Also grants +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, both to the wearer and their allies.

items.name: Commissar Flak Breastplate
items.description: Base armour property: +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Intelligence is more than 65.

items.name: Commissar's Cloak
items.description: The wearer gains the {g|f:e8e9fbe8696e4820b84c733ceba629af}Get Back in the Fight!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Compensator Gloves
items.description: The wearer ignores weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} while performing ranged {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks. The {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of the wearer's weapon is increased by +{uip|RoF|6b05d079fd9548d9b504205aef4f2362}%. Rate of fire is rounded down to the nearest integer.

items.name: Composite Gloves
items.description: If the wearer has a shield equipped, whenever the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} (multiple hits in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} are considered a single hit), the shield gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}. Lasts until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: Compound Void Shield Array
items.description: Provides 120 points of protection for each sector.

items.name: Condensed Carapace
items.description: The wearer's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat is increased by +{uip|CritChance|1144f936b5e14273b7d60367992364a8}%. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against human enemies.

items.name: Conmilitum Badge
items.description:
When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain {uip|THP|710968757d334435b89dacc3d0ba5a63} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the enemy hit by the wearer.
These benefits are not applied when using {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}.

items.name: Conversion Field
items.description:
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from this hit is prevented.
