After that, a {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is inflicted on all characters in a 2-cell radius around the wearer until the end of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Coordinate Oracle
items.description: This matrix grants the wearer a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}.
items.flavorText: This augment, masterfully crafted by the Adeptus Mechanicus, is a locator matrix. Its sensors monitor the surroundings and transmit the information to the owner's brain, enhancing their coordination and spatial awareness.

items.name: Corpuscarii Oath
items.description: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using {g|f:5617027d4ab7419092156bfadd0fff05}Reanimation Protocol{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Corrupted Enforcer Boots
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer is always slowed but immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect.
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's melee attacks fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 turn if they fail a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Check|c9279ededcda42f58f38dda7b6a16946} penalty. If passed, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 1 turn instead.

items.name: Corrupted Inferno Pistol
items.description: This pistol increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} by +10 and does not require weapon proficiency to be wielded.

items.name: Corruption Eradicator Helmet
items.description: The wearer's critical damage bonus is doubled against xenos, daemons, and psykers.
items.flavorText: The small, methodical notches on the helmet suggest that its owner kept track of slain abominations. The number of the notches suggests that their service was righteous.

items.name: Craft Bay: Fury Interceptors
items.description: Fury Interceptors are good at destroying small ships, torpedo salvos, and overloading void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, but the thick armour of capital ships presents a substantial obstacle. ! Only 2 wings of attack craft can be in the flight at same time. Land one wing to be able to launch another.

items.name: Craft Bay: Fury Interceptors
items.description: Fury Interceptors are good at destroying small ships, torpedo salvos, and overloading void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, but the thick armour of capital ships presents a substantial obstacle. ! Only 2 wings of attack craft can be in the flight at same time. Land one wing to be able to launch another.

items.name: Craft Bay: Fury Interceptors
items.description: Fury Interceptors are good at destroying small ships, torpedo salvos, and overloading void {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, but the thick armour of capital ships presents a substantial obstacle. ! Only 2 wings of attack craft can be in the flight at same time. Land one wing to be able to launch another.

items.name: Craftworld Power Sword
items.description:
Decreases the target's weapon {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} by −3 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} after the wielder has parried an attack.
<indent=5%>+30% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>

items.name: Craven's Bane
items.flavorText: The terrifying weapon of Yrge Sukhoi, a ship disciplinary officer who single-handedly put down a mutiny staged by the cowardly officers of the Void Triumpher.

items.name: Crescendo
items.description: When the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack or {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 2 or more enemies with this shotgun's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged area attack{/g}, they gain +1 attack until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

items.name: Crimson Haze
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
The user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (6). As long as the user is bleeding, they get +100% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.
items.flavorText: A stimulant that links the pain and pleasure centres of the brain. The unholy potion is rumoured to be brewed with mutant blood.

items.name: Crimson Intoxicants
items.description: The user loses all of their temporary wounds and increases their melee damage by the same amount for 1 round.

items.name: Crimson Oblivion
items.description: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

items.name: Cruciatum Litany
items.description: Each of the wearer's single attacks gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on the target.

items.name: Crucible of Torment
items.description: This weapon has an additional extremely short-range {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} (2 cells) and increased {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} (50%).

items.name: Crucible-Born Tempest
items.description:
The Touched who were recruited as enforcers gave form to the ancient knowledge stored in their minds by modifying the voidship's weapons using sacred archeotech.
Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Cruel Fate
items.description: This weapon gains +75% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}. Whenever the wielder scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Crusade Plate Gloves
items.description:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Crusade Plate Helmet
items.description:
When the wearer attacks with a heavy weapon, they deal +30% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, but their {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is reduced by −50%.
This effect is inactive, while the wearer is under the {g|f:e63c911438394fb69d58597549f65688}confident approach{/g} effect.

items.name: Cry of Agony
items.description: This klaive's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} has an increased area of effect.

items.name: Cultist Armour Plates
items.description: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty, or the attack will deal only half of the damage on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

items.name: Cultist Hood
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent
Once per turn, when the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} attack, they either restore 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} or take 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with a 50% chance for each of those effects.

items.name: Cursebringer
items.description:
When this weapon hits, the target must pass a Willpower resistance test or suffer {uip|Damage|02095d0bf4604c7ea77d876cb876256d} levels of {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}warp burn{/g}.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Cursed Boots
items.description:
Whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} to each adjacent creature and to the wearer themselves.
The wearer also deals an additional +{uip|MoreDamae|dfe89c96a963499f8a5ca14f9b95e7b4} warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies.

items.name: Daemon Tool
items.description: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} character also suffers {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (3). Burning effects inflicted by the wearer have their level increased by +{uip|Damage|d37c749a078b4629aea1a924c594c19d}.

items.name: Dancing on Blood
items.description:
Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.
After using this {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g} ability, the wearer regains MP equal to their resolve.

items.name: Daredevil Pistol
items.description: This pistol has a special attack that costs 0 AP, has increased rate of fire, and ends the wielder's turn.

items.name: Daring Cutlass
items.description: When the wielder has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}, attacks with this sword always score critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a +100% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

items.name: Dark Lance
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Dark Providence
items.description:
If the wielder is a psyker, they can immediately re-roll a failed parry attempt once per attack with a chance of success equal to their Willpower.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Dark Reaver
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an enemy ranged attack, they immediately perform a single attack with the equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon on a random adjacent enemy. This attack has +35% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and can only be performed three times in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Dark Swiftness
items.description: Grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The user suffers a −10 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} during the next round.

items.name: Dark Visionary Hood
items.description: This hood grants the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to psychic and Navigator powers, but inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

items.name: Dashing Aquila
items.description:
The wearer gains the {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can be performed twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, all adjacent enemies suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} until the start of the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
Does not stack.

items.name: Deadly Dancer Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} reach 0, the wearer deals {uip|Damage|02b02020fbd24a5191a6528dbef3ec78} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} to all adjacent enemies.

items.name: Deadly Precision
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Single-shot{/g} attacks with this pistol always score {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.

items.name: Deadly Repeater
items.description: The wielder gains a 30% chance to gain one more attack action after a kill.

items.name: Deadshot Splinter Rifle
items.description: This rifle has {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}. Deadeye shot deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to {uip|Damage|c4b67aae857f464290040b025f2e6252}.

items.name: Death Cult Blade
items.description:
Death Cult weapon gains the following:
-<indent=5%>−{uip|Parry|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|Crit|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the wielder's critical hit chance for each attack they make. This bonus stacks until the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Death Cult Power Blade
items.description:
Death Cult weapon gains the following:
-<indent=5%>−{uip|Parry|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|Crit|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the wielder's critical hit chance for each attack they make. This bonus stacks until the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Death Dealer Gloves
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2% for each critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and for each enemy they killed until the end of combat.

items.name: Death Hymn
items.description: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

items.name: Death World Warboots
items.description: These boots grant their wearer a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.

items.name: Deceiver Shifting Shield
items.description:
Provides 130 points of protection for each sector.
This shield can be immediately withdrawn at any time. For example, when ramming an enemy, it will not be spent and will not provide any protection.

items.name: Deck Officer's Helmet
items.description: Grants +5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Defender
items.description:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

items.name: Defensive Boots
items.description: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they double their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} in partial cover until the end of the wearer's next turn.

items.name: Deflection Gloves
items.description: These gloves allow the wearer to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} using {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}.

items.name: Demolition Instructions
items.description: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}, and their {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} with weapons deal an additional +{uip|Damage|1f24a40c3a9d4ee8841e835f119f8c50} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Demolitionist's Goggles
items.description: Whenever the wearer fails a Demolition skill test, they can immediately re-roll it, using Agility instead of Demolition.

items.name: Denial of Nightmares
items.description: If worn by a psyker, the wearer gains immunity to the {g|f:423e91ce057d4e2489043ded7306f3e2}horrors of the warp{/g} effect.
items.flavorText: This amulet is painfully cold to the touch. It once belonged to an Astropath who stood strong against the horrors of the warp. Though its former owner met a terrible end, his unbending will lives on in this relic.

items.name: Desolation Blast Pistol
items.description: Every {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from this pistol inflicts +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}.

items.name: Detachment From Death
items.description: Allies of this staff's wielder have their dodge increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.

items.name: Detachment From Death
items.description: Allies of this staff's wielder have their dodge increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.

items.name: Detachment From Death
items.description: Allies of this staff's wielder have their dodge increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}%.

items.name: Detonation
items.description: Warhead detonation

items.name: Diagnostor
items.description: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}.

items.name: Dimensional Traveller Cloak
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

items.name: Disciple's Boots
items.description: The wearer gains +{uip|Dodge|ab83495228d0477dbbbb20c2c390cc58}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against enemies under the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}.

items.name: Disemboweler
items.description: Increases the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} level caused by this axe by +1 until the end of combat for each strike attack performed by it.

items.name: Disinfection Device
items.description: This device grants the wielder a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.

items.name: Dissector's Amulet
items.description:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

items.name: Distraction Cape
items.description: This cape lowers all enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} within a 5-cell radius.

items.name: Diviner's Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Djin Blade of Yremeryss
items.description: If the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

items.name: Dog Tag
items.description: When the wearer kills a target the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +10 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the round.

items.name: Doombringer Hood
items.description: Whenever the wearer makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, this attack deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

items.name: Double Torpedo Tubes
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} each capable of firing 2 salvos of 6 short-burning leech torpedoes.
<indent=5%>Reload: 2 rounds</indent>

items.name: Double-Barreled Shotgun
items.description: This shotgun never misses.

items.name: Dragon Scale Power Armour
items.description: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if they kill an enemy. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Dreadmonger Grenade
items.description: Creates a zone of fear in the area of explosion for 1 round. Zone of Fear: all creatures in the area must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or immediately move out of the zone even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}. This movement triggers {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} from allies of the ability's user who have passed the resistance test or are outside the zone.

items.name: Duelling Sword
items.description: After scoring a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the duelling sword, if the wielder has a weapon in the other hand, they immediately attack the closest enemy with it, using whichever attack costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Duellist Uniform
items.description: If the wearer equips two pistols, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Ballistic Skill is more than 70.

items.name: Dust of Rending
items.description: A bag of strange dust that shimmers with impossible shades of colours that should not exist.

items.name: Dynamo Boots
items.description: Increase the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +3.

items.name: Earthbreaker
items.description: Each attack with this weapon decreases the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by −4, even when parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

items.name: Ebonite Maul
items.description: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword suffer a number of {g|f:45bce77d4a7d458781177cf9353cd462}static charge{/g} stacks equal to damage dealt by the attack. When a creature with those stacks is killed, all creatures adjacent to it (except the wielder) suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} equal to <u>number of {g|f:45bce77d4a7d458781177cf9353cd462}static charge{/g} stacks</u>.

items.name: Ebonite Sword
items.description: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword suffer a number of {g|f:45bce77d4a7d458781177cf9353cd462}static charge{/g} stacks equal to damage dealt by the attack. When a creature with those stacks is killed, all creatures adjacent to it (except the wielder) suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} equal to <u>number of {g|f:45bce77d4a7d458781177cf9353cd462}static charge{/g} stacks</u>.

items.name: Echo of Victory
items.description: Whenever the wearer attacks any target in a 5-cell radius around them with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g}, this attack deals {uip|ArmourPen|a6765d2f82434282a2bde6d959e3b6b8}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
items.flavorText: A compact trans-sonic emitter that speeds up projectiles fired by a weapon. It is adorned with gold and the bones of the righteous, as is befitting of a relic of Saint Cognatius.

items.name: Edge of the Irrevocable
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Fanatic
Each successful attack with Edge of the Irrevocable raises {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by +<u>(from 1 to 5)</u> and deals an additional +{uip|Damage|cce8d529e407406695a7cc7dde1ebe70} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. It also grants:
-<indent=5%>All allies deal +{uip|AllyDamage|cce8d529e407406695a7cc7dde1ebe70}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The wielder gains +{uip|PsyRating|cce8d529e407406695a7cc7dde1ebe70} (minimum of +1) additional {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If veil degradation reaches 20, successful attacks with Edge of the Irrevocable trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If veil degradation ever drops to 0, Edge of the Irrevocable loses all its powers until the end of combat.</indent>
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Efficient Breacher's Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +15% armour against xenos enemies. Extra property: +15% parry.

items.name: Elastic Gloves
items.description: For the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, if the wearer kills 3 or more targets using a weapon {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, that area attack does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g}.

items.name: Elder Flow
items.description: The wearer's first attack during the first {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} of combat costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Whenever the wearer attacks an enemy and triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} with this attack, the triggered effect is calculated as if this enemy had a +1 additional exploit. ! Can only be equipped by Aeldari.

items.name: Elite Blast Pistol
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Elite Marksman Gloves
items.description: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

items.name: Elite Synth-Leather Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack with a shield for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Elixir of Warp Neutrality
items.description: Grants immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, but the user cannot deal warp {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Embroidered Cloak
items.description:
Grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer is affected by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, they gain +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until end of combat. Stacks.

items.name: Emerald Cherub Ring
items.description: This ring grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}. It also increases {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

items.name: Emergency Drill
items.description: This weapon has a special attack called {g|f:3c11c05ae18d4d4a992308b584a388ab}Drilling Strike{/g}.

items.name: Emergency Injector
items.description:
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0, they do not fall unconscious. Instead, they immediately regain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} wounds granted by the stasis field, spend all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, if any, and, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, gain +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and cannot regain MP.
! Can only be used once per combat.

items.name: Emergency Vox-Casters
items.description: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

items.name: Emperor's Justice
items.description:
Allies auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.
{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} of wearer's weapon is increased by +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill}%.

items.name: Emperor's Will
items.description: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}. If the target fails the test, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
items.flavorText: A weapon that once belonged to the Pure-Voiced Prophet and was eventually presented to the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius.

items.name: Empyrean Storm
items.description:
The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} makes 7 attacks, each of which targets a random enemy in an 8-cell range and deals <u>(from 8 to 14)</u> warp {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Can only be used once per round.
Duration: +1 round for every 10 points in the Warp Channeller's Lore (Warp) skill.

items.name: Empyrean Transceiver
items.description: Whenever the wearer is targeted by an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains <u>ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
items.flavorText: A loathsome and twisted piece of technology created by the accursed Cubis Delphim, imbued with the power to contact voices from the warp.

items.name: Enchanted Smuggler's Armour
items.description: The wearer suffers −{uip|Armour|fd26808c79844c5885885530cce69f77}% less warp, mental, and {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. Base armour property: +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against human enemies.
items.flavorText: The reverse of this reinforced uniform is covered in unholy symbols, inscribed by a sorcerer of the Fellowship of the Void to slow the mind-withering corruption that afflicted him while transporting heretical artefacts.

items.name: Enemy Finder
items.description: If the target of the wearer's ranged attack fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, that attack inflicts {g|f:1711d1c36c8f40a9a8cb557515d0f31f}exhaustion{/g} on that target.

items.name: Enforcer Carapace
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against human enemies.

items.name: Enforcer Helmet
items.description: All targets of {g|f:13e41af1d54c458da81050336ce8e0fc}Taunting Scream{/g} suffer a −{uip|Penalty|1cfd47812aa548a0b56bc4bb638033fc} penalty to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

items.name: Enforcer Light Boots
items.description:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, they immediately strike back at the attacker.
If this attack deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the wearer performs {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} the enemy away.

items.name: Enforcer Light Carapace Gloves
items.description:
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, that enemy suffers −{uip|Penalty|9098d7052be2442c999672a46b5d595e}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the wearer's next turn.
That enemy also must pass a Toughness {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −30 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the wearer's next turn.

items.name: Enhanced Data-Tether Mask
items.description: When the wearer uses {g|f:95cdd5f42ef5480d9fadd9e0acee641b}Machine Spirit Communion{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is increased by +5 for each affected target until the end of combat.

items.name: Epiphany
items.description: If the wielder kills an enemy with {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
items.flavorText: This blade has been blessed by a preacher by the name of Himalisk. While dispersing a crowd, an unmannerly warden swung it at the Emperor's servant, only to receive an epiphany of faith, fall to his knees, and tearfully plead the prophet's forgiveness. The prophet was merciful to the warden and took the sword from his hand, promising that henceforth it would only strike at enemies of the faith.

items.name: Equaliser
items.description: This weapon deals additional damage equal to the target's difficulty tier.
items.flavorText: Neither status nor rank can stop the relentless might of this weapon.

items.name: Ergo Boots
items.description: Increase the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} by +10.

items.name: Eroding Autogun
items.description: Targets hit by this autogun suffer +20% more toxic damage until the end of combat.

items.name: Eruption
items.description: All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} deal 25 {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} to everyone in a 2-cell radius.

items.name: Ethereal Visor
items.description:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1.
As long as the wearer has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they deal +{uip|Damage|8a2f48a26a1444debe80707fbb14c034}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} and psyker staves.
items.flavorText: A creation of esotericist Magos who lift the veil separating the Empyrean from the Materium, using their instruments to penetrate the limits of the non-existent with the utmost care.

items.name: Excruciating Shriek
items.description:
Deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c30fadf556f44a19999880964ae9482d} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, and gains +{uip|Pen|c30fadf556f44a19999880964ae9482d}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
Targets have +30% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against attacks made with this weapon.
These benefits are not applied when using {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}.

items.name: Excruciator Maul
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Excruciator Maul
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Executioner's Gauntlets
items.description: Increases the critical damage of {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g} (including the damage from the attack itself and from extra instances of damage-over-time effects) by +{uip|Damage|cf41ec4ff0374fa78a5335640a2864b8}.

items.name: Exitus Longlas
items.description: Grants +25% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. If the wielder has at least {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot, {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|3188b332a5044c73964b85b1e07438ad}.

items.name: Exoskeletal Gloves
items.description: The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.

items.name: Expeditionary Footwear
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Experimental Assault Rifle
items.description: This rifle has 3 different {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks with different {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} only one of these burst attacks is available, determined randomly.

items.name: Experimental Psy-Amplifier
items.description: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} is calculated as if {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} were increased by +3 and always triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}.
items.flavorText: A sinister-looking device that blends Imperium technology with the unholy knowledge of the xenos. Sargona used it to take his psyker abilities to their absolute limits. However, it is common knowledge that everything comes at a price.

items.name: Eye of Hecaton
items.description:
Grants +5 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} after each attack and allows the wielder to move after attacking. If an attack with this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} 3 or more targets, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
This rifle has +100% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.
items.flavorText: A weapon created under foreign stars and obtained by Calligos Winterscale as spoils of combat. Its shots are devious and deadly, as is the very essence of xenos.

items.name: Eye of the Omnissiah
items.description: Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 92% hit chance and 15% critical hit chance.
items.flavorText:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

items.name: Eyes of Joyeuse
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 against daemons and for each rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by a sanctioned psyker.
items.flavorText: The reliquary helmet is embedded with the auspex targeting system of the beneficent Militant Bishop Joyeuse. The saint's blood is caked in the cracks of the visor, staining the battlefield a deep purple-black.

items.name: Face of the Sovereign
items.description: The wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} whenever they kill an enemy.

items.name: Familial Power Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Fang of Perdition
items.description: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.
items.flavorText: The tooth of an unknown semi-material creature, extracted from the corpse of the pirate leader Kernanes, a renowned hunter of xenobeasts.

items.name: Fatebringer
items.description: The wielder's attacks with this sword ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
items.flavorText: Despite its ceremonial appearance, the sword is perfectly usable in combat. The blade is polished, and the hilt is encrusted with blue crystals.

items.name: Fencing Boots
items.description:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

items.name: Fiery Retribution
items.description: This heavy flamer has an additional area attack called {g|f:0da2cd0110bf4264b6e118c8ae894930}Scorching Retribution{/g}.

items.name: Fiery Vengeance
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary
If the wearer or their ally is critically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an enemy, the wearer immediately performs an attack with their current weapon against this enemy if the enemy is within range. On a successful hit, this attack inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

items.name: Final Chord
items.description: When shooting the last shell from this shotgun, this shot ignores the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. That target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

items.name: Fine Work Gloves
items.description: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} and +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

items.name: Fire Grenade
items.description: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6) for 3 rounds.

items.name: Fire Grenade
items.description: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6) for 3 rounds.

items.name: Fire Grenade
items.description: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

items.name: Fireblessed Carapace
items.description: This carapace grants its wearer +2 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} as well as immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

items.name: Fireproof
items.description: Grants immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, but reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10 and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by −2 until the end of combat.

items.name: Fireproof Cape
items.description:
The wearer of this cape is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.
Also, whenever the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, burning is removed from all adjacent allies.

items.name: Fireproof Gloves
items.description: The wearer suffers −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} / 3)</u>% less {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}. If they are suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the level of burning is reduced by −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}.

items.name: First Aid Manual
items.description: Using any medikit costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less (but no less than 0).

items.name: Flamer
items.description: Flame weapons have 2 special area attacks with different areas of effect.

items.name: Flamer
items.description: Flame weapons have 2 special area attacks with different areas of effect.

items.name: Flamer Digi-Weapon
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:0d179aa9276c4780a95e77801d6c77d5}Flamer Shot: Stream{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Flamer Digi-Weapon
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:0d179aa9276c4780a95e77801d6c77d5}Flamer Shot: Stream{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Flames of Retribution
items.description:
At the start of combat, the wielder suffers 1 level of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} and cannot remove burning through {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder inflicts {uip|Burning|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} levels of burning on all adjacent creatures. If enemies affected are xenos or daemons, they additionally suffer {uip|Damage|bc678cefb78a475fbdea38e2a672fce0} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Flash
items.description: The user immediately doubles their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and reduces the costs of their non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} by −2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (to a minimum of 0) until the end of their turn. After the effect ends, the user suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round.

items.name: Flashbang
items.description:
Targets within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} must pass an Agility {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|6225349f83d04650818bfec56bcede5d} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} and suffer +2 stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 1 round.
If the wielder has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot, all their allies ignore this effect.

items.name: Flashlight Emitter
items.description: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g}).

items.name: Focus Incense
items.description: Each use of {g|f:8638221f9caf46649cefcbd7574804d1}Revel in Slaughter{/g} increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by +10 until the end of combat. Stacks.

items.name: Foehammer
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.
items.flavorText: A shotgun pistol. Foehammer is popular with many naval ship's officers as well as crew chiefs who need an intimidating weapon.

items.name: For the Defence of Cadia
items.description: When the wearer of this badge gains a stack of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}versatility{/g}, they also gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

items.name: Forbidden Xenos Compendium
items.description: Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.

items.name: Force Field Emitter
items.description: After using {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Force Grenade
items.description:
Deals 5 {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} within the area and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the targets 2 cells away.
If a target in this area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it falls {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Force Sword
items.description: This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Forceful Paw Strike
items.description: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Fortis-Pattern Torpedo Tubes (Melta)

items.flavorText: The magnificent bracelets of the pirate leader Hermanios were once slave shackles. After starting a mutiny and forging a crew out of the prisoners aboard the captured convict transport, Hermanios had the chains decorated with gold and crystals. The glorious rebel leader presented them to the Rogue Trader as a token of respect.

When the wielder uses it, they become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} costs 3 AP.
