items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Heavy Rock Saw
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Heavy Rock Saw
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Heavy Rock Saw
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Heavy Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|30c675c6da0e4ecba9697349629a8d85}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

items.name: Heavy Shock Baton
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Heavy Void Suit
items.description: The wearer suffers −30% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from area and {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks. Base armour property: +20% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against human enemies.

items.name: Heavy Xenomesh
items.description: Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against non-human enemies.

items.name: Hecutor-Pattern Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 33 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Hecutor-Pattern Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 33 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Hecutor-Pattern Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 33 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Hecutor-Pattern Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 40 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Heirloom Autopistol
items.description:
This autopistol can be used as if the wielder has the Dual-Weapon Combat {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.
<indent=3%>+5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}</indent>
<indent=3%>+5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}</indent>

items.name: Hekatarii Blade of Bloodthirst
items.description:
This blade deals an additional +{uip|Damage|0e45284b27f74feb9993195c1ab8933a} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to targets for each common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} on them.
These benefits are not applied when using {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}.

items.name: Helbrute Horn Trophy
items.description: The wearer gains the {g|f:3b31d95710a04630b0955181c6af650c}Relentless Rage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that can be used once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Helliarch's Gloves
items.description: The wearer's attacks ignore targets' {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g}.

items.name: Helm of Determination
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}
The wearer of this helmet gains +{uip|Armour|71687ec9ba584ffa95cd1e81a54bcd92}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The helmet also grants a bonus to Fellowship equal to {uip|Fellowship|71687ec9ba584ffa95cd1e81a54bcd92}.

items.name: Helmet of the Devoted Protector
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Follower
This helmet grants its wearer immunity to enemy critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} for the first 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} of combat.

items.name: Herald Servo-Skull
items.description: This servo-skull is designed to spread the glory and splendour of its mighty owner.

items.name: Herald Servo-Skull
items.flavorText: This servo-skull is designed to spread the glory and splendour of its mighty owner.

items.name: Hexagrammic Grace
items.description: Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
items.flavorText: A relic offered to the Rogue Trader as a gift for {mf|his|her} willing and productive cooperation with one of the esteemed Ordos of the Holy Inquisition.

items.name: Hexrifle
items.description: When this shot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, it poisons the target with a viral {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} if the enemy fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

items.name: Hidden Auto-Stimulant
items.description:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.
items.flavorText: A cogni-stimulation system designed to be connected to the user's body. This sacred mechanism likely belonged to a Tech-Priest or noble who perished during a mission to the ship's holds along with the precious machine.

items.name: High Spinner Armour
items.description: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

items.name: High Spinner Cloak
items.description: {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g} deals an additional +{uip|Damage|4e13c403d0b2471da1cddbc3bfae039f} mental damage. Each target hit suffers +1 stack of fatigued for 2 rounds.

items.name: High Spinner Gloves
items.description: Increases the critical damage of {g|f:5c06542194b74ecc922b92f3543703d2}Where It Hurts{/g} (including the damage from the attack itself and from extra instances of damage-over-time effects) by +{uip|Damage|0e36aac7736d40bca321b5a1883a7edc}.

items.name: Holo-Field Emitter
items.description:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

items.name: Holy Fire
items.description:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

items.name: Holy Power Armour
items.description: When the wearer suffers damage more than or equal to {uip|Wounds|f5809de6da7e407b95e15f8f7154a4d8}, this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} unleashes a blast of energy, dealing (from 20 to 25) {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Holy Vestment
items.description: Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|45d920f667354737be5efb18e0ddc6df}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} +{uip|TechUse|45d920f667354737be5efb18e0ddc6df} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}
items.flavorText: Blessed by Omnissiah's adherents.

items.name: Honour Insignia
items.description: If only one of the wearer's {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area is active in combat, the wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.

items.name: Hope Pendant
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Votary
At the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} (except for {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}), the wearer gains +{unit_stat|Resolve} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} for each ally (including themselves) with 50% or less {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Hospitalant Medical Kit
items.description:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} negative effects.
items.flavorText: A medical kit assembled and blessed by devout hospitalant monks. The instruments are adorned with respectful litanies of fortitude, and the preparations were made by venerable ascetics.

items.name: Hot Shot Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Hot Shot Laspistol
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Howler Cannons
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 26 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
items.flavorText: These fearsome weapons were cast on the great world of Kiava Gamma. Gunners whisper about having heard otherworldly cackling on the artillery deck at night and claim that people go missing there. When these weapons are fired, they let out a terrifying howl, as if their muzzles house the souls of malefactors. The truth, however, is far more frightening...

items.name: Hungering Mind
items.description: The power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer is increased by +1 for each enemy affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} until the end of combat. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} stacks.
items.flavorText: Equipment containing a weakened malicious warp spirit. A starved daemon is locked inside the highly advanced iridial cogitator. Its batteries perpetually near-empty, the spirit will ravenously devour any thermal energy from its surroundings save for its owner's body heat.

items.name: Hunter Carapace
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}partial cover{/g}.

items.name: Hunter's Focus
items.description: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attacks.

items.name: Hunting Rifle
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to larger enemies:
-<indent=5%>Hulking creatures (2×2 cells) suffer +5 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enormous creatures (3×3 cells) suffer +10 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Massive creatures (4×4 cells) suffer +15 damage.</indent>

items.name: Hymn of Vehemence
items.description: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.

items.name: Hypnotising Pendant
items.description: When the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack, the target suffers {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Ice-Covered Aquila
items.description: Whenever the wearer suffers a critical hit, the attacker immediately suffers {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} warp damage.
items.flavorText: The symbol of the Imperium gleams proudly under a crust of purple psychic ice. The frozen shell bears faint fingerprints left by Choirmaster Weisz in the midst of his desperate struggle against the warp.

items.name: Icebreaker Sabatons
items.description:
The {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} ability costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and deals +{uip|Damage|15ad552f904944b19a7064a81bfcd801} more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of the {g|f:22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9}Kick{/g} ability is reset.

items.name: Immaculate Servo-Skull
items.flavorText: This servo-skull is designed to spread the glory and splendour of its mighty owner.

items.name: Immaterium Routing Amulet
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses a Navigator power, they always physically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the next attack by moving to a random adjacent cell. This effect doesn't apply to {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

items.name: Immaterium's Channeller
items.description:
If the wielder's psy rating is 9 or higher, this sword has its damage, dodge reduction, and armour penetration increased by a percentage equal to veil degradation.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Imminent Torment
items.description: Enemies that suffer from the {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effect cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attacks performed with this weapon.

items.name: Immobilising Grenade
items.description: Targets within the area of effect must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round. On a successful test, the targets suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect.

items.name: Impenetrable Shroud
items.description: Reduces the hit chance of all ranged attacks made against the wearer and their allies by −{uip|HitChance|bd97fcc04ece40e798297a64175990b6}%.
items.flavorText: An archeotech device distorted by the reckless hand of a Tech-Priest overly devoted to his lay allies. Wishing to grant them extra protection in skirmishes, he conducted an experiment utterly condemned by the Adeptus Mechanicus, shortly after which he was betrayed and his creation sold to pirates.

items.name: Imperial Pride
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} against xenos, psykers, and servants of Chaos is increased by +4.

items.name: Imperial Scroll
items.description: This scroll grants the owner a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

items.name: Imperial Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 8) gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

items.name: Implacable Tempest
items.description: This lasgun deals an additional +{uip|Damage|71d06b927ac34b68810cdfcac273c221} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemies with more than 60% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Improved Heavy Bolter
items.description: Each kill with this weapon increases its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} by +1.

items.name: Improved Heavy Rock Saw
items.description: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Improved Injector
items.description:
The user gains +{uip|THP|b36fb556ddc04c10ac31264c55eb3da8} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} from combat stimulants.
The first use of any combat stimulant per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Improved Lightweight Boots
items.description: The wearer of these boots gains +{uip|Parry|116f8ed237df4e4bbabfaf9175eb7121}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and re-rolls failed {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

items.name: Improved Power Pick
items.description: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Improved Webber
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Improvised Webber
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.
items.flavorText: The design of this webber matches the standard pattern, but the weapon was put together from assorted parts.

items.name: Impulse Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer makes a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, they regain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and gain +{uip|Crit Hit Chance|f08a8a9e6e6142b7b839d5c1d8fda4db}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}. Lasts until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Incandescent Storm
items.description: Every attack action with this plasma gun has a separate {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}. All of this plasma gun's attack actions can be used in a single {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Incinerator
items.description:
Each critical hit scored with this weapon inflicts {uip|Damage|dcd22529be0d4481982b04f2a4ae9fc3} levels of {g|f:3ddbf131cbd54087a665d4b2e026b0f2}warp burn{/g}.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Incompetent's Punishment
items.description: Each stack of {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}unyielding beacon{/g} increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} by +2.
items.flavorText: A cape infused with magnetic threads controlled by a crystal matrix in the clasp. A servant was skinned to make it, as a punishment for failure. The servant's eyes are forever watching the wearer's back, as the Haemonculus did not grant him the release of death or the right to be mercifully unaware of his miserable condition.

items.name: Incubus Blade Armour
items.description: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} deals (from 10 to 15) {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 5%) to any target in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} when the wearer makes a melee attack. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 65.

items.name: Industrial Fyceline
items.description: Deals <u>(from 40 to 70)</u> energy damage with 10% armour penetration and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the targets 3 cells away.

items.name: Industrial Hammer
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Inertia Boots
items.description: If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} (except the {g|f:6f1b7cfb48a0450cb85ce8a8879502de}Death From Above{/g} and {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g} abilities) is {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}, or scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, the wearer gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Inevitable Demise
items.description: Doubles {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} dealt by the wearer.

items.name: Infernical
items.description: The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of this flamer is increased by +4%, but it does not inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect.
items.flavorText: Thousands of witches and heretics have been incinerated with this distinguished weapon, all in His name. Boiling in its fuel tank is no common promethium, but rather a highly potent mixture that detonates on contact with air.

items.name: Inherent Blasphemy
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
This bolt pistol deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

items.name: Inherent Blasphemy
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
This bolt pistol deals {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

items.name: Injection Adapter
items.description:
The user gains +{uip|THP|fd6b9cc0cac448a48dc7368a72791cec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} from combat stimulants.
Using combat stimulants costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Inquisitor's Badge of Office
items.description: The wearer automatically passes any {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}.

items.name: Insatiable
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attacks{/g} from this weapon against {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} targets deal +<u>(5 × target's burning level)</u>% more damage.

items.name: Insatiable Djin Blade
items.description: After the wielder deals any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with this sword, until the end of combat they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and the target suffers a −3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to those {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

items.name: Instability Detonator
items.description:
This item grants its wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to Tech-Use.
Once per battle: can be used to immediately remove all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects from enemies in a 10-cell radius. These enemies receive {uip|Damage|6725144561134f9fa6c05d871f25ab2e} {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} (with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}).
items.flavorText: A mysterious piece of technology crafted by Electro-Priest artisans. While in passive mode, it senses every defect in the surrounding matter. When activated, it generates a pulse that accelerates the entropic decay of these unstable points by a factor of thousands.

items.name: Instigator's Mantle
items.description: {g|f:13e41af1d54c458da81050336ce8e0fc}Taunting Scream{/g} targets do not need to fail the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} to be affected by this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

items.name: Insulator Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|6c70b429eea84371b8efa579bcc1297c}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Their incoming energy, fire, and {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} are reduced by −35%.

items.name: Intendant Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses a consumable item, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Interrogation Goggles
items.description: These goggles grant the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}. They also grant +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against xenos.

items.name: Interrogator's Dagger
items.description: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|Test|b04f00d9faf0433eb413f55d0ccaa680} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or immediately be moved 4 cells away, provoking {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

items.name: Intimidating Growl
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Follower
Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, if possible, they counter-attack that enemy, gaining an additional +{uip|Crit|bd8e102e7b9344079ccd7ee7b2afb8cc}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
items.flavorText: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

items.name: Intoxicating Elixir
items.description: The user gains +15 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, +15 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, and −20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

items.name: Invigorating Resolve
items.description: Whenever the wearer and allies in a 2-cell radius gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, they also gain an equal amount of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Invincible Onslaught Armour
items.description: The wearer gains the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} and {g|f:d9f20b396eb64a4293c9e3bd3270e0dc}Invincible Onslaught{/g} abilities. Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, they deal +{uip|DmgDeflection|2c4c34ff909a4d3f86b2ad25c5659b96} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Iron Cape
items.description:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.

items.name: Iron Grip
items.description: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.

items.name: Iron-Eye Grenade
items.description: Creatures caught in the corrosive grenade blast area suffer a −<u>(their current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} / 2)</u>% armour decrease.
items.flavorText: Inside the grenade there is a charge of acid and a low-powered gravity generator that keeps it from touching the shell.

items.name: Ironclad Argument
items.description: The wearer gains +{uip|Coercion|b1e58489a7364d3c9167bbf453dbd19d} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

items.name: Jovian-Pattern Class 1 Drive
items.description: This plasma drive provides 13 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with low {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Jovian-Pattern Class 2 Drive
items.description: This plasma drive provides 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with low {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Jovian-Pattern Class 4.5 Drive
items.description: This plasma drive provides 15 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with low {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Judex
items.description: If a target hit by this flamer's attack is suffering from burning at the end of its turn, that target explodes, inflicting burning of the same level on all enemies in a 3-cell radius. That target must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −15 penalty or fall unconscious for 1 round.

items.name: Karkalla's Honour
items.description:
Grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that affects all adjacent cells around the wielder.
<indent=5%>+1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} per target in the area of effect</indent>
items.flavorText: Lord Karkalla, the leader of the Trebul rebellion, had his head struck clean with this noble blade. Despite his apostasy, even his enemies recognised the valour and nobility of Karkalla, who was generously granted a noble death by beheading.

items.name: Kasrkin Armour
items.description: The wearer restores 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} after killing an enemy (once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}). Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} is more than 70.

items.name: Kasrkin Gauntlets
items.description: These gauntlets grant the wearer a +10% bonus to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Khaine's Revenge
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they immediately counter-attack (Can even counter-attack with a ranged weapon in melee range). That counter-attack deals {uip|Damage|587c463377a14c9f843841fd7a19f461}% of weapon damage (cannot be more than 100%).

items.name: Kinesiostatic Shield
items.description:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

items.name: Kinesiostatic Shield
items.description:
The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}. Whenever the wielder successfully {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain a number of kinesiostatic shield stacks equal to the portion of that attack's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the wielder makes an attack with this shield, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|8df04f6a9021470d9ded7af02e71fb8f} {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}. After that, all stacks are removed.

items.name: Knife
Knife
Knife
Knuckle Guard
items.description: This knuckle guard grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. It also grants any equipped {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Knuckle-Dusters
items.description: These knuckle-dusters grant the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

items.name: Krak Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 24 to 48)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Krak Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 24 to 48)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Lady Theodora's Immaculacy
items.description: The wearer's Persuasion is increased by +{uip|Pers|9b515e49a1874208bac8e1d8d0b50e34}.
items.flavorText: Lady Theodora's ashes were subjected to immense pressure and turned into this resplendent diamond to be interred in the ship's crypt. The gemstone's sapphire hues veined with gold and purple are reminiscent of the von Valancius family colours.

items.name: Lady Theodora's Mantle
items.description: At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, if there are more enemies than allies in combat, the wearer deals +20% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons.
items.flavorText: This xenos hide mantle once adorned Lady Theodora's shoulders. In the years since then, all had forgotten its existence, as well as that of the station it was left on.

items.name: Lady Xue's Ritual Blade
items.description:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} to an enemy, that enemy must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or die immediately. If passed, they suffer an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
All enemies of {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} VI or above are immune to this effect.
These benefits are not applied when using {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}.
items.flavorText: This remarkably sharp and durable curved blade was Lady Xue's personal weapon, which she brought with her to Janus.

items.name: Large Medikit
items.description:
-<indent=5%>Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the character has the {g|f:91932ac8a5794d5cb9ed539bf7d528a2}Combat Medicae{/g} or {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.</indent>

items.name: Large Medikit
items.description:
-<indent=5%>Restores {uip|Heal|d722bfac662c40f9b2a47dc6ea70d00a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Heals one fresh injury, or, if none, one old injury upon a successful Medicae {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the character has the {g|f:91932ac8a5794d5cb9ed539bf7d528a2}Combat Medicae{/g} or {g|f:9aefa8d7db3349358e23b2106578353b}Field Medic{/g} talents, the amount of restored wounds will be increased by the bonuses provided by these talents.</indent>

items.name: Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
