items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Laspistol
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Last Stand
items.description: While the wielder has less than 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} and an adjacent ally still in combat, the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} cannot drop below 1. Each instance of lethal damage inflicts a random trauma instead.

items.name: Last-Ditch Armour
items.description: Once the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to 0 for the first time in combat, they immediately regain +{uip|Wounds|2314620f28d146a0ad4b8f9e69df6731} wounds, remaining in combat, and gain +100 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against ranged attacks.

items.name: Lathe Grav-Culverin
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 27 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Lathe Grav-Culverin
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 27 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Lathe-Pattern 2a Engine
items.description: This plasma drive provides 11 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with strong {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Lathe-Pattern 2b Engine
items.description: This plasma drive provides 12 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with strong {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Laughing God's Pendant
items.description:
The wearer gains the {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
The Assassin dashes in a straight line for up to <u>(1 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} bonus / 2)</u> cells, suffering −<u>Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} bonus</u> less damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +<u>Assassin's WS bonus</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's turn.
If the Assassin has not dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +<u>(2 × Assassin's AGI bonus)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Does not stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.

items.name: Laughing Wolf Helm
items.description: When the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +2 for each target affected by it.

items.name: Laurels of Command
items.description:
The wearer gains the {g|f:d8008dcfa0004bcca41b26b802d839b2}Move, Move, Move!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer and targets of {g|f:d8008dcfa0004bcca41b26b802d839b2}Move, Move, Move!{/g} are immune to the {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} effect until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Lawbringer
items.description: Grants an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that ends the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and deals an additional +30 {g|Encyclopedia:MachineDamage}machine damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Leather Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against human enemies.

items.name: Leech Torpedo Tubes
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} each capable of firing 2 salvos of 6 short-burning leech torpedoes.
<indent=5%>Reload: 2 rounds</indent>

items.name: Leech Torpedoes
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} each capable of firing 2 salvos of 6 short-burning leech torpedoes.
<indent=5%>Reload: 2 rounds</indent>

items.name: Lexmechanic's Goggles
items.description: Grants +3 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}.

items.name: Life Sunderer
items.description: Attacks with Life Sunderer grant +50% to {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.
items.flavorText: A heavy weapon capable of raining fragmentation projectiles, grafted onto the biomechanical body of the Chtonos by the cruel Haemonculus. Its magnetic radiator feeds on the liquid essence gathered from the bodies of the monster's victims.

items.name: Life-Draining Sword
items.description: On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this sword, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 penalty. On failure, the target suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect, and {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is increased by +1. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g}: the wielder restores {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to the bleeding target.

items.name: Light Carapace Scale Armour
items.description: The wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if they move at least 3 cells per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|d15d54dcad1347c4bca2a577781fd508}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Light Flak Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. +1 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried attack.

items.name: Light Missile Artillery
items.description: A short-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} missile launcher, which fires 3 missiles, dealing 18 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per missile.

items.name: Light Spinner's Breastplate
items.description: Base armour property: +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. Extra property: +5 Agility.
items.flavorText: The wearer of this armour serves the Undying Emperor with absolute devotion, as evidenced by the grim vows on the purity seals and the dried bloodstains from countless foes.

items.name: Lightweight Boots
items.description: The wearer of these boots gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} while wearing a light {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Lilaethan's Calm
items.flavorText: An ancient xenos weapon that keeps the memory of the Janusian spirit wreathed in blue flame.

items.name: Lilaethan's Fury
items.description: When the wielder deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the target with Lilaethan's Fury, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} until the end of combat. The first attack with Lilaethan's Fury in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against the blinded target does not set the attack on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.
items.flavorText: A weapon adorned by xenos artisans that keeps the memory of the Janusian spirit wreathed in purple flame.

items.name: Lingering Whisper
items.description: The wearer deals +{uip|Dmae|18b7dddd2ccf46f3ab13739d0c32fa4d} more damage to targets with less than 50% wounds.

items.name: Liquifier Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 25 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and inflicts +3 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Litany of Empyrean Fury
items.description: Every psychic or Navigator power used by the wearer's ally deals additional direct damage to all enemies in combat equal to {uip|Damage|5b436aeed46e49b292e4bb4c0f2056a5}.
items.flavorText: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.

items.name: Litany of Exhaustion
items.description: Any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with the wearer's single attacks inflict +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds if the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Long-Range Aim Lens
items.description: Increases ranged attack distance by +{uip|Dist|afea036c51bd4cdaabe5f1fb789e474f} cells.

items.name: Longlas
items.description: A {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this longlas stuns the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.

items.name: Longlas
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Loyalist Garb
items.description: If the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +20% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. If the wearer moves at least 3 cells per turn, they gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round. Base armour property: +20% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.
items.flavorText: The battle garb of a mysterious assassin who came from Holy Terra itself to execute the corrupt Admiral Batillera. The servant of the Emperor did his duty but was eliminated by the wicked man's guards. The armour was retained by the Administratum and bestowed upon the von Valancius dynasty for their diligence in establishing order in the Expanse.

items.name: Luck Thickener
items.description:
Each time the wearer uses a minor {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, all allies affected by this power gain +1 stack of the thick luck effect.
Thick luck allows those affected to re-roll a failed attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} attempt and is then removed.

items.name: Lullaby of Sha'eil
items.description: Whenever the wielder's attack with this weapon scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}, its base damage is increased by +{uip|Damage|9f76314d15a24116bf349701ecc396cc} until the end of combat.

items.name: Makeshift Heavy Xenomesh
items.description: Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against non-human enemies. Additional property: +5 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Malefic Tome — Belief in the Inscrutable
items.description:
This item increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} by +25.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent, in combat, they and all their allies gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, but suffer a −9% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

items.name: Malpian Shroud
items.description:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.
items.flavorText: This relic was given to the Rogue Trader by the Malpians as a sign of their appreciation of {mf|his|her} valuable patronage.

items.name: Mantle of Extermination
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with an area attack, the wearer's allies gain +5% critical hit chance until the wearer's next turn. Stacks.

items.name: Mantle of Heroism
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Follower
Each {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} used in battle increases the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by +20% until the end of combat (max 60%).

items.name: Mark 8B3-5 Filter Gas Mask
items.description: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} and becomes immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}.

items.name: Mark of the Ruler
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:501282c1591440c3a208c57e92094945}Laser Shot{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Mark-100 Augur Array
items.description: Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 80% hit chance and 5% critical hit chance.

items.name: Mark-201.b Augur Array
items.description: Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 90% hit chance and 5% critical hit chance.

items.name: Marksman Bracers
items.description: The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +25% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

items.name: Mars-Pattern Class 3 "Typhoon" Engine
items.description: This plasma drive provides 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g}, along with low {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}, and significantly reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.

items.name: Mars-Pattern Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Mars-Pattern Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Mars-Pattern Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Mars-Pattern Macro-Battery (Extended)
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 6 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Mars-Pattern Prow Battery
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} mounted {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Marshal's Armour of the Koronus Expanse
items.description: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

items.name: Marshal's Armour of the Koronus Expanse
items.description: The targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 70.

items.name: Marshal's Helmet of the Koronus Expanse
items.description: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

items.name: Marshal's Helmet of the Koronus Expanse
items.description: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a shield, all allies in a 3-cell radius gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat. Does not stack.

items.name: Martyr Boots
items.description:
The wearer can move through cells adjacent to enemies spending the normal amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}.
Also, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} each time they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

items.name: Martyr's Bone Charm
items.description: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +10 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

items.name: Martyr's Penance
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire an {g|f:d22f788b9bb44ab0addf08575d131036}Inferno Pistol Shot{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Mask of Whispers
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. The wearer does not suffer this effect themselves.

items.name: Master Duellist's Gloves
items.description: Whenever the wearer scores a critical hit with a ranged attack, their next attack against any target automatically hits and cannot be parried or dodged.

items.name: Master Surgeon Gloves
items.description:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}.
Each time the wearer uses a medikit, it provides an additional +{uip|THP|9c163da3bc8f411c841258866a6e93aa} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Master-Crafted Power Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Master-Crafted Power Maul
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Mechanicus Respirator
items.description: This respirator grants the wearer a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}.

items.name: Medal of Alacrity
items.description: When the wearer targets an ally with the {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in combat, that ally gains +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

items.name: Medikit
items.description: Contains various cataplasm patches, antiseptics, and synthetic skin applicators. Restores {uip|Heal|083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.

items.name: Medikit
items.description: Contains various cataplasm patches, antiseptics, and synthetic skin applicators. Restores {uip|Heal|083d5280759b4ed3a2d0b61254653273} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.

items.name: Melee
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Melee
items.description: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Melee
items.description: Claw Strike

items.name: Melee
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Melee
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Melee
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Melee
Melee
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Melee
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Melee
items.description:
Death Cult weapon gains the following:
-<indent=5%>−{uip|Parry|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|Crit|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the wielder's critical hit chance for each attack they make. This bonus stacks until the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Melee
Melee
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Melee
items.description:
Death Cult weapon gains the following:
-<indent=5%>−{uip|Parry|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|Crit|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the wielder's critical hit chance for each attack they make. This bonus stacks until the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Melee
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Melta Ring
items.description:
A ring weapon that fires a single melta shot.
Can only be used once per combat.

items.name: Melta Ultima
items.description: This melta weapon modified by the Adeptus Mechanicus has increased firepower and range.

items.name: Meltabomb Mortar
items.description:
Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
Whenever it hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 75% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship for <u>(from 3 to 4)</u> rounds.

items.name: Memory of The Daring
items.description: Provides 125 points of protection for each sector. This amount is doubled against enemy kinetic attacks.
items.flavorText: The void shield array of The Daring, a heroically destroyed frigate. The mechanism was found among the wreckage of the ship, which fought the forces of the Final Dawn and saved a convoy of refugee transports bound for Footfall at the cost of her own life.

items.name: Meragon Boots
items.description:
While under the effect of {g|f:613246cc28464ade9845da9b30dc65c3}ruthless suppression{/g}, the wearer is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
Carefully engraved on the sole are the words, "His footsteps were thunderous, and his name, Meragon, made every soul tremble; it meant but one thing for his foes, and that thing was death."

items.name: Meragon Helmet
items.description: If the wearer is the Arbitrator with the Castigator specialisation, their Castigator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} cost 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
items.flavorText: Shiny, ornate letters run along the rim of the helmet: "He was sharp of sight indeed: nary a vice in a rotten soul, nary a shadow in the murk of lawlessness could escape Severius Meragon's all-seeing eye."

items.name: Meragon Ring
items.description: When the wearer kills a target for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, their next attack automatically {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}. The wearer's Arbitrator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} used this round can be used again.
items.flavorText: The ring is adorned with tiny golden lettering: "Severius Meragon, the first Marshal of this temple of the Lex Imperialis, was a righteous judge until the day the Emperor summoned his soul."

items.name: Meragon Shield
items.description:
The wielder's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Resist|f559ffbb3abd415bbe46fd75f06fcfea}%, and damage dealt to xenos and daemons is increased by +{uip|Damage|f559ffbb3abd415bbe46fd75f06fcfea}%.
An inscription on the inner side reads: "Many an enemy of Humankind took aim at Meragon's heart, yet this shield stopped each foe's deadly sting, for the God-Emperor protects His faithful servants from death's rapacity."

items.name: Mercy's Gift
items.description: While in combat, the wearer of this cloak gains a +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} whenever there are no enemies in a 4-cell radius.
items.flavorText: This fabulous article of clothing demonstrates the sheer vastness of the divide between its wearer and filth-smeared serfs. A perfect fit for any true Cold Trader favoured by fickle fortune and living at constant risk of being sent to the gallows.

items.name: Mesh Vest
items.description: Base armour property: +5% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}

items.name: Metal Claw Gloves
items.description: Whenever the wearer hits a target with a melee attack, the target's armour is reduced by −2% until the end of combat. Stacks.

items.name: Metronome
items.description: If the wearer did not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +10 to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} next turn.

items.name: Mezoa Lance Weapon
items.description: Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 45 to 55)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Mezoa Lance Weapon
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 52 to 60)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Mezoa Lance Weapon
items.description: Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 45 to 55)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Mezoa Lance Weapon
items.description: Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 45 to 55)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Mezoa Macro-Cannons
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Mezoa Macro-Cannons
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Might of Fenris Armour
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:9395d6c10694470f8c8ea3c74c7e09c7}Go For the Throat{/g} is reset. Base armour property: +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Militant's Cloak
items.description: The wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} in combat cannot be parried or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}.

items.name: Military Combi-Tool
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses a non-attacking consumable item (e.g. stimulant, medikit, etc.), it counts as an attack of a different type than the previous attack for the purposes of {g|f:7f7d109653f24774939f758d094b8812}Versatility{/g}. Also, this combi-tool grants a 50% chance that a consumable item will not be spent when used.

items.name: Mind Assemble Circlet
items.description:
Whenever the wearer uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −2.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual.</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of their attack.</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this effect triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.

items.name: Mindkiller Staff
items.description: Each enemy the psyker kills with a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} from the telepathy discipline permanently increases the effective power level of all telepathy discipline staves this character wields by +1.

items.name: Mindscrambler Grenade
items.description:
Anyone within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the targets also {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}.

items.name: Mindtwitch Grenade
items.description:
The affected enemy immediately turns into an ally and gains an extra turn. As soon as the extra turn ends, the target turns back into an enemy.
All enemies of difficulty tier V or above are immune to this effect.

items.name: Missionary Oath
items.description: Once per combat, if the wearer does not use any abilities during their turn, they can end their turn to immediately grant all adjacent allies an extra turn with 1 AP.
items.flavorText: An ancient scroll containing a solemn vow of service to the Emperor, penned by an unknown missionary from the words of the great Nadine Aleynikov.

items.name: Mjodlner
items.description: This weapon only has the {g|f:a39a31f8f11445cba7e420dce565babc}Strike{/g} ability. On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, each enemy in a 2-cell radius around the target is also attacked and cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} that attack.

items.name: Modified Artificer Armour
items.description: The wearer's attacks with heavy weapons cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. Base armour property: +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Modified Breacher's Armour
items.description: The wearer gains +{uip|THP|4ebf0daf3a5d4b53b4d9323e3d3869a2} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each of their allies at full wounds at the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|4ebf0daf3a5d4b53b4d9323e3d3869a2}% armour.
items.flavorText: Armour that previously belonged to the commander of a boarding party, who discovered that his employers were tech-heretics and so gave them up to the Cognisance Fleet. In a coordinated attack with the Adeptus Mechanicus, he drenched the decks of the enemy ship in blood but met his death in the process. As a mark of respect, the servants of the Omnissiah preserved and modified his armour, honouring the officer's heroism with new functions.

items.name: Modified Krak Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 35 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ImpactDamage}impact damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Modified Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
items.flavorText: A lasgun modified by some handyman.

items.name: Mon-Keigh Hide Cape
items.description: Decreases all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} except {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} by −{uip|Damage|c6af4d981ffe4a46ac8c1fa9891ec337}%.

items.name: Monofilament Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 16 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} with 15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Multi-Melta
items.flavorText: The largest type of melta weapon, usually only employed by the Adeptus Astartes or mounted upon Imperial vehicles.

items.name: Mysterious Sliver
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses a major {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, they gain +{uip|Damage|c8def6e18b5e47f68cfadef7ee0ecbb2}% to all psychic power damage until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
items.flavorText: A shard of wraithbone that broke off from an Aeldari structure. It now serves as a memento of the heated battle against the spirits of Janus.

items.name: Mystic Ward
items.description:
At the start of every combat, the wearer's allies gain {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.
Whenever an ally suffers any {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and loses non-temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, this effect is removed from that ally.

items.name: Navigator Monocle
items.description:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever an ally is affected by the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, that ally gains +{uip|DodgeRed|b8abf96d31c640eabf90b7b3c81b68c2}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.

items.name: Navy Breacher Boots
items.description: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Navy Swashbuckler's Coat
items.description: This coat grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} and +5% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

items.name: Necrontech Hot Shot Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Needle Pistol
items.description: Slows enemies and inflicts +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} effect.

items.name: Needle Ring
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:9ab94c22f40147a0a04edc58ca7ff29e}Toxic Needle{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Negotiator Pistol
items.description:
Attacks from this pistol inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g} effect.
<indent=5%>+5 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}</indent>

items.name: Neuro Disruptor
items.description: Deals {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} to the target. If the target fails an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}, its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} are reduced by −10 and its {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is reduced by −1.

items.name: Neuro-Haptic Amplifier
items.description: If the wearer uses {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g}, but its effect is not triggered by the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} during their next turn.

items.name: Neuro-Stimulant
items.description: The user gains +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. After that the user suffers −20 to Willpower until the end of combat.

items.name: Noble Silk Gloves
items.description: The wearer gains a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
items.flavorText: Exquisite accoutrements for the hands, usually worn by aristocrats.

items.name: Noble Sword
items.description: On a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword's attack inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect on the target for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. If the target of the attack is already suffering from the disturbed effect, the attack deals an additional +{uip|Damage|75df60d2377a4e8db4848f661885dc98} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to this target.

items.name: Noise Suppression Helmet
items.description: When the wearer kills an enemy in a 1-cell radius with a shot, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Notes on Weaknesses
items.description: The wearer gains a permanent +{uip|Damage|6ea380e19640428c9c74235a5d52cc61} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}. This bonus is doubled if the wearer's attack triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}.

items.name: Nullifying Shotgun
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Officer's Aquila Pendant
items.description: The target of the wearer's {g|f:d8008dcfa0004bcca41b26b802d839b2}Move, Move, Move!{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} automatically {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their current weapon and gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Officer's Chainsword
items.flavorText: A well balanced variation of a standard-issue chainsword used by the officers of the Imperium.

items.name: Officer's Medikit
items.description: Restores {uip|Heal|49a5f617380f43e2a44e5774e97cd076} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.

items.name: Omnispex
items.description: Whenever the wearer targets 3 or more enemies with one attack, those targets suffer −{uip|Penalty|9d6ff11d926343b1a22c210b27ee4575}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Omnissiah Holy Symbol
items.description: The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} and +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}. They can also re-roll failed Tech-Use or Logic {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} once per test.

items.name: Omnissiah's Providence
items.description:
If the target of this axe's attack is suffering from the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to the target is increased by +{uip|Debuff|6ceac4db06434d3eae9c7839290aaf1d}% until the end of combat.
If the target of the attack is not suffering from both {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} and {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g}, both of these effects are inflicted on the target after the attack.

items.name: Onslaught
items.description: Instantly increases {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} by +6 and grants 2 charges of the {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, yet reduces {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} by −15 until the start of the user's next turn.

items.name: Onslaught Amulet
items.description:
After the wearer uses {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g}, if the wearer still has:
-<indent=5%>More than 5 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: the next attack ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>More than 15 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks: also ignores {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.</indent>
If the wearer already has the {g|f:402d4b8938fa491da2058c62a65047b8}Undisputed Advantage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, then using {g|f:7989c6e3109841329aee9e4546138395}Press the Advantage{/g} will only spend 1/4 of the {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks instead of 1/2.

items.name: Open Soul Pendant
items.description: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

items.name: Operator's Gloves
items.description: The wearer gains a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

items.name: Ossificator
items.description: Grants +30% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and inflicts a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Outcast's Visor
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single ranged attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately makes an additional attack.

items.name: Overcharge Gloves
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses overcharge on a plasma weapon, that attack ignores enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and deals +{uip|Damage|1c3dd98848f34a2281b8172467035d89}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Overcharged Plasma Gun
items.description: This weapon can only make overcharged attacks. Its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|32f278450e09490784e95deab3e56550}%.

items.name: Overseer's Aquila
items.description: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, using their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} grants them {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

items.name: Pacification Webber
items.description:
Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this webber suffer −30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}. At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −10 penalty to remove this effect.
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Pack of Reagents
items.description: This set of chemical reagents increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of all {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects applied by the user by +2.

items.name: Pain Blocker
items.description: The user suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from any source until the end of combat. After the combat ends, the user suffers 1 random {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

items.name: Pain Grip
items.description: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

items.name: Pair Holster
items.description: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, when the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with a pistol, the next attack with a pistol costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Panoply of the Assassin
items.description: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} is increased by +10% until the end of the combat. This effect resets after any attack made on the wearer. Base armour property: +15% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

items.name: Partner in Death
items.description: Whenever an ally adjacent to the wielder attacks an enemy, the wielder makes an attack of opportunity against that enemy if possible.

items.name: Peculiar Trinket
items.description:
At the start of the wearer's turn, they gain {uip|THP|7476be1b085d4e17a558d3b9f25a87d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop to 0, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, and gain 10% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds. The wearer becomes the {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} of adjacent enemies. While prone, if the wearer has no other allies with more than 0 wounds, they and their allies die.
On the wearer's next turn, they regain 30% of their wounds if they still have temporary wounds.
This effect activates only once per round.
items.flavorText: This odd-looking object made from an unknown material was found near an undocumented tunnel on Vheabos VI.

items.name: Peripheral Control Monocle
items.description: Using a non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} grants the wearer a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wearer for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. This effect stacks.

items.name: Peripheral Visor
items.description: Each time the wearer spends 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g}, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Phantom Cloak
items.description: Grants +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

items.name: Phantom Lance
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 36 to 52)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Phantom-Killer Bodyglove
items.description: The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can move through enemies. The wearer's first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and does not count toward the {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attack limit per turn{/g} but deals −50% less damage. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

items.name: Phoenix Gem
items.description:
The wearer gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} and +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}.
Whenever the wearer uses a medikit or a stimulant for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, it costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Pict-Recorder Servo-Skull
items.flavorText: This servo-skull is designed to spread the glory and splendour of its mighty owner.

items.name: Piety's Charge
items.description:
All collisions caused by the thunder hammer's {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} attacks deal +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
All targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this thunder hammer must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
items.flavorText: An archeotech weapon that belonged to Saint Cognatius himself and is considered one of his most holy relics. The hammer was found by the ascetic Nicomedes Keefe and kept in his tomb for many centuries.

items.name: Pinpointing Visor
items.description: Grants +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} against enemies with less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} left.

items.name: Pirate's Eyepatch
items.description: This eyepatch grants its wearer a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} and applies a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}.

items.name: Pistol
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Pitch-Black Desolator
items.description: This weapon inflicts a special immolation effect that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) but cannot be removed until the end of combat. The target also must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Plasma Autoloader
items.description:
At the start of each turn, it reloads any onboard plasma {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}torpedo tubes{/g}.
The bulky machinery of the loader adds +30 to the voidship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} but decreases its {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} by −1.

items.name: Plasma Bomb Strike
items.description: A set of bombs designed to deal damage to heavily armoured voidships.

items.name: Plasma Bomb Strike
items.description: A set of bombs designed to deal damage to heavily armoured voidships.

items.name: Plasma Cannons
items.description: Plasma cannons operated by a pilot.

items.name: Plasma Pistol with Cryo-Module
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}Reloading{/g} this weapon removes all stacks of {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} from the wielder.

items.name: Plasma Ring
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:c23c91c1dd3f45aa86ba38a9478823b4}Plasma Shot{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Plasmashaper Gloves
items.description:
These gloves grant the wearer a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.
They also increase the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of plasma weapons by +3.

items.name: Pneumo Boots
items.description: Using the {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

items.name: Poet's Grace
items.description: The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} and +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

items.name: Pollen of the Unreal
items.description: Deals <u>(from 10 to 15)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and 20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}. All creatures in the area of effect make a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the creature immediately attacks an ally from their current position.
items.flavorText: The grenades are loaded with a hallucinogenic chemical brewed from the rose of Zamarkand that plunges men into terrifying reverie.

items.name: Portable Cogitator
items.description: This cogitator grants the owner a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLogic}Logic{/g}.

items.name: Portable Deflector
items.description: The wearer always auto-{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the first {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from each attacker on the battlefield.

items.name: Portable Motive Force Storage
items.description: If worn by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, the wearer can use {g|f:eab4d0bba84f4d1294f5cd64a1b33084}Overcharge{/g} multiple times per combat, but only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The bonuses do not stack.

items.name: Portative Manipulator
items.description: Using {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reload{/g} for any weapon costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. (Minimum 0)

items.name: Power Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Power Grips
items.description: Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Power Maul
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Power Pick
items.description: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Power Pick
items.description: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Power Pick
items.description: This weapon has an extra attack action which increases armour penetration of all subsequent attacks made against the same target by +10 for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Precinct Vox-Relay
items.description: If an ally under the effect of the wearer's {g|f:5bfccf14d8604ae1a041fb347fb8f19f}Bring It Down!{/g} ability successfully {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with an attack or targets them with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat for each different enemy hit or targeted.

items.name: Precise Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Precise Laspistol
items.description: This pistol has an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shot{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}.

items.name: Prey Scanner
items.description: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} effect on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g} and grants a double {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

items.name: Procyon A Plasma Pistol
items.description: If the wielder is a Tech-Priest or has another plasma weapon in the same set, overcharge attacks from this weapon cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less.

items.name: Procyon B Plasma Pistol
items.description: Shots from this pistol never cause {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g}, but plasma overcharge attacks cost +{uip|AP|43fd6cdd5921407f9eac01903ce5afd7} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.

items.name: Promethium Mortar
items.description:
Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 14 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.
Whenever it hits an enemy ship's {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g}, it has a 50% chance to start {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}internal fires{/g} on that ship for <u>(from 3 to 4)</u> rounds.

items.name: Promise of Freedom
items.description: Every {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from this weapon inflicts +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
items.flavorText: Once resting in Nemesite's lofty hand, this stub revolver gave many downtrodden the false promise of freedom.

items.name: Promise of Freedom
items.description: Every {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from this weapon inflicts +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}.
items.flavorText: Once resting in Nemesite's lofty hand, this stub revolver gave many downtrodden the false promise of freedom.

items.name: Promise of Retribution
items.description: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.
items.flavorText: Modified to serve Nemesite's great purpose, this stub revolver brings retribution to all who are too weak to oppose its wielder's idea.

items.name: Promise of Retribution
items.description: This weapon deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerBallisticSkill|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the target for each stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} suffered by that target.
items.flavorText: Modified to serve Nemesite's great purpose, this stub revolver brings retribution to all who are too weak to oppose its wielder's idea.

items.name: Protector of the Faith
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}
Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a daemon for the first time in combat, that daemon becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Provocateur's Helmet
items.description: Applies a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} for all attacks made against the wearer and to all enemies in a 2-cell radius from the wearer.

items.name: Provocative Emitter
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} an attack, they become a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for the attacker until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Psy Focus
items.description:
The wearer deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c3e12b66f464444c8f09b3aea3ccac31} {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
Whenever the wearer suffers a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −30% until the end of combat.

items.name: Psy-Stifler
items.description: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.
items.flavorText: Forever embedded in Idira's temples, the sinister implant of the Haemonculus Tervantias will finally rid her of the endless barrage of whispers and nightmares. But what will it take from her in return?

items.name: Psychic Bodyglove
items.description: The wearer ignores the first {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in combat. Base armour property: +{uip|Dodge|ce34933143fc43a3a807966bfa838b0c}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 40.

items.name: Psychic Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 6) gains the Lightning Arc {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Psychic Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 6) gains the Lightning Arc {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power.

items.name: Psychic Ward
items.description: While {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is equal to or more than 10, the wearer deals +{uip|Damage|3f393bf570474b7bbc6e702ae8edf612}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with all {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}. ! Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.
items.flavorText: This curious adornment was solemnly presented to the Rogue Trader by a group of wild psykers on the capital world of Dargonus.

items.name: Psyker's Breastplate
items.description: Reduces the chance of triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} by −10%. If any psychic phenomena or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} manifest, the wearer gains an additional +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} until the end of combat. Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

items.name: Psyker's Footwear
items.description: These boots grant their wearer +3% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the end of combat for each psy power they use. Stacks.

items.name: Pulsar Lance
items.description: A long-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing 84 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Pungent Smoke Grenade
items.description:
This grenade creates a toxic area of thick smoke which lasts for 4 rounds and decreases the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and to be hit with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g} by −50%.
If the target in that area fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|b4badfcae32246c28ccecdef5f5ae9ef} penalty, it suffers {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (20).

items.name: Purging Fury
items.description: The first attack with this flamer in combat deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons, equal to 10% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect applied by this flamer deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 2% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to xenos, psykers, and daemons.

items.name: Purifying Flame Helmet
items.description: The wearer's melta weapon attacks cost −1 AP less and melta weapon range is increased by +2 cells.
items.flavorText: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

items.name: Pyromancer's Staff
items.description:
The wielder of this staff (power level 7) gains the {g|f:8a759cdc2b754309b1fb75397798fbf1}Inferno{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power.
<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}</indent>

items.name: Pyromaniac Boots
items.description:
The wearer cannot suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect by walking over burning cells.
The wearer inflicts +3 additional stacks of burning whenever they stand on burning cells.

items.name: Pyros Melta Broadside Macro-Cannons
items.description: Short-ranged broadside melta {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} with 4 shots, dealing 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Pyros Melta Broadside Macro-Cannons
items.description: Short-ranged broadside melta {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} with 4 shots, dealing 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Pyros Melta-Cannons
items.description: Short-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} melta {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per each shot.

items.name: Quick-Firing Laspistol
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Burst{/g} shot's cost is decreased by −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. First attack with this weapon in combat does not set attacks on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

items.name: Radiant Chestplate
items.description: Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. +7 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} −5% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}

items.name: Radiant Gloves
items.description: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

items.name: Radiant Shield
items.description: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, the attacker must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Ragefire Plasma Gun
items.description: While the wielder has 2 or more {g|f:0835dbc012334dd49f849fcc92e9f708}plasma cell overheating{/g} stacks, this weapon deals an additional 30% damage as {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}.

items.name: Rallying Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer's ally uses {g|f:a39d7daf9b884978a66ef00675b2766f}Following!{/g}, that ally deals +33% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their next attack for each ally within a 2-cell radius around the wearer.

items.name: Rampage
items.description: The user's attacks do not count toward the attack limit until the end of this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Afterward, the user is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

items.name: Ranger Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against non-Aeldari enemies.

items.name: Ranger's Visor
items.description: Grants a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

items.name: Rapid-Fire Autogun
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Reactivator Armour

Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|ba7be88fef58472a98adb0d094c1e06b}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Reactivator Pack
items.description: {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g} costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the target familiar gains {uip|Fellowship Bonus|2f1c349fa4f04d16a835a156c8db3ed9} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and a +{uip|Fellowship Bonus|2f1c349fa4f04d16a835a156c8db3ed9} bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

items.description: Grants +12% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

<indent=5%>−15 {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g}</indent>

items.name: Reconstructed Flamer Pistol
items.description: When {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon, all {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against the target gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +15% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}.

items.name: Red Crystal Staff
items.description: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Red Wolf Skull
items.description: The wearer gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and immunity to all {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g}.
items.flavorText: Ulfar's helmet is covered in mysterious Fenrisian runes and spiral patterns that invoke the might of the Space Wolves' homeworld and recount the many perils the Space Marine endured before he first donned his power armour.

items.name: Redemption Gauntlets
items.description: Each of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of {g|f:197b8a8a12b0442db7ffee1067cf3d97}Expose Weakness{/g} reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

items.name: Reflective Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

items.name: Reflective Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

items.name: Reinforced Boots
items.description: These boots grant their wearer +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}Collision{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} caused by the wearer is increased by +{uip|Damage|5db94011cf9f4531a77ecfdcdd19e18a}.

items.name: Reinforced Incubus Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

items.name: Reinforced Kabalite Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 65.

items.name: Reinforced Voidsman Armour
items.description: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot. The wearer of this {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is immune to critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} as long as no party member has been {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} throughout the entire combat. Base armour property: +15% armour against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

items.name: Relic Silencer
items.description: The wearer does not lose the {g|f:670419fc312d4ee2b2298d03af22e0c2}elusive{/g} effect if they attack from {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

items.name: Relics of Unknown Saints
items.description: When the wearer has less than 50% wounds, every second attack against them is automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g}. The effect lasts for up to 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Relished Anguish
items.description: At the end of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}collision{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} inflicted by the wearer this turn.

items.name: Rending Chainaxe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Renunciation of Weakness
items.description:
Each critical hit scored with this weapon reduces veil degradation by −{uip|Range|525bb3514e67472fa05ff18a304117d6} and increases the wielder's Willpower by +{uip|Damage|525bb3514e67472fa05ff18a304117d6} for 1 round.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Repulsor Shield
items.description: Provides 80 points of protection for each sector. This amount is doubled against enemy kinetic attacks.

items.name: Requiemator
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills their target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, all enemies in a 2-cell range around the wearer suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
items.flavorText: A small detector whose purpose is to sense the currents of life and death. Its steel casing conceals an excised fragment of an unfortunate psyker's brain. Their last spark of life is caged within it. The only thing this tortured mind is still capable of perceiving are the death throes of a living being. Upon sensing them, it releases a devastating blast of psionic energy.

items.name: Resonance Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(2 × target's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} + target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.

items.name: Restless Absolution
items.description: If this weapon's attack fully negates the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, this attack deals an additional +75% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Retinal Analyser
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with a shield, that target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or be knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

items.name: Rib Suit
items.description: Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker's critical hit chance against them is reduced by −{uip|CritRed|7f49924fd83944638d5dfc93a693b779}%. Base armour property: +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} if the wearer's Toughness is more than 75.

items.name: Righteous Anger
items.description: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

items.name: Righteous Anger
items.description: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

items.name: Righteous Anger
items.description: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

items.name: Righteous Justice
items.description:
This sword grants the following effects based on the wielder's rank of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Dogmatic — Adherent: ignores the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} of xenos, daemons, and psykers.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dogmatic — Votary: additionally ignores the {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} of xenos, daemons, and psykers.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dogmatic — Fanatic: additionally ignores the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} of xenos, daemons, and psykers.</indent>
items.flavorText: This weapon sheathed itself in glory when it was used in ceremonious single combat between the Malpians and the Order of the Hammer.

items.name: Ring of the Iron Will
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with {g|f:1c5f4edca9f64fe0911bc946e0b4ea4a}Shield Bash{/g}, {g|f:def7164545244af28d52cd38d0502525}Double Slug{/g}, {g|f:2162ce26f6db4cd1b748a4105c364ddb}Fulminating Shot{/g}, or {g|f:027e75ab89364049b844a720feca85ec}Grisly Adjudication{/g}, they make a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −40 penalty. If the wearer succeeds, the target is {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

items.name: Riposte Gloves
items.description: If the wearer is an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} and successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an enemy's attack, it automatically creates an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on that enemy on the side closest to the wearer.

items.name: Ritual Knife
items.description:
This knife has a 100% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} targets.
When the wielder scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this knife, the target and everyone in a 4-cell radius around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or make a single attack against the nearest target.

items.name: Roaring Thunder
