items.description: This thunder hammer deals +3 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and grants a +10% stacking chance to stun an enemy for one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} for each point of the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} negates this effect. Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Rogue Trader's Cloak
items.description: Grants +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for each enemy in a 2-cell radius.

items.name: Rosary of Defence
items.description: The wearer gains a {uip|Ignore|d7877eeb7dd44b9595cce50113fbf2e5}% chance to ignore any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Ruby Splash
items.description:
The wearer can use ranged weapons in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}.
The wearer's ranged attacks against adjacent targets gain +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|e9aec82234b847ef8532feed4f674f31}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.

items.name: Rune Armour
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} is more than 50.

items.name: Rusty Heavy Rock Saw
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Ryza-Pattern Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Ryza-Pattern Plasma Battery
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Ryza-Pattern Plasma Battery (Shortened)
items.description: Long-range broadside plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: R–50 Auspex Multi-Band
items.description: Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 98% hit chance and 5% critical hit chance.

items.name: Saboteur's Gloves
items.description: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g}.

items.name: Saboteur's Helmet
items.description:
The wearer suffers −35% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
The first use of a grenade in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not count toward the limit of {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.

items.name: Sacrament of Light
items.description:
An engine assembled by a mysterious clique of engine elders, countenance hidden by veils of openwork plasteel, and whose wisdom is so great that servants below the rank of Magos are forbidden from even addressing them.
This plasma drive provides 15 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with average {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Sacrifice
items.description:
Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this weapon, veil degradation is reduced by the −<u>Wielder's psy rating<u>. After that, the wielder gains +1 psy rating for 1 round.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Sage Necklace
items.description: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g} and + 15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}

items.name: Saint Cognatius's Ostensorium
items.description:
Whenever the wearer suffers an attack from a daemon or {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, they inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (8) to all adjacent enemies.
All burning effects inflicted by the wearer deal double {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if they target daemons or psykers.
items.flavorText: A precious gift from the Order of the Hammer to the Rogue Trader, who rid Foulstone of a false idol.

items.name: Saint Cognatius's Relic
items.description: Wielder gains a +5% chance to reduce incoming {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} by half for each point of {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
items.flavorText: A sacred artefact offered to the Rogue Trader for resolving the conflict with the Malpian sect.

items.name: Saint Cognatius's Scriptures
items.description:
Grants +20 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.
The wearer gains +{uip|Bonus|65635384b5de4f9aadee246bdbf9b694}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and deals +{uip|Bonus|65635384b5de4f9aadee246bdbf9b694}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} to xenos and daemons.
Also, they can re-roll a failed {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once per test.
items.flavorText: A fabled holy relic that was given to the Rogue Trader for safekeeping after {mf|he|she} joined the side of the pious in their dispute against the hollow-hearted servants of the Omnissiah.

items.name: Saint Katherine's Adulation
items.description: Grants +80% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and a special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that allows the wielder to perform three consecutive attacks on an enemy.

items.name: Saint's Bone Charm
items.description: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, when the wearer gains a stack of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they also gain +20 Toughness for 2 rounds. Does not stack.

items.name: Sanctified Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff, with a power level of {uip|PowerLevel|e401f82ef7134a31b40cbf821f24a8f6}, gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Using Emperor's Wrath grants the psyker additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equal to the staff's power level until the start of the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

items.name: Sanguine Judgement
items.description: While the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, their melee attacks deal +15% more damage. Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} the enemy attack, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Sanguine Thirst
items.description: This power axe deals +{uip|Damage|cdd3a569389d4a90b4b4c859652b3e19} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets. If it is the first attack against a bleeding target, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

items.name: Saturated Cape
items.description: When the wearer uses {g|f:4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}Endure{/g}, they immediately remove one of the effects on them in the following order: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Saturnine-Pattern Class 3 "Battering" Engine
items.description:
This plasma drive provides 12 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with strong acceleration and low braking.
In addition, it grants +3 additional void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement points{/g} when ramming.

items.name: Saturnine-Pattern Class 5 Engine
items.description: This plasma drive provides 13 {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} along with strong {g|Encyclopedia:AccelerationBrakingSpace}acceleration and braking{/g}.

items.name: Scarlet Signet of the Inquisition
items.description: The wearer gains +25 Persuasion and the {g|f:3d775c8682564aa6b12ab8f0c81956e5}Inquisitor's Decree{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability can only be used once per combat.
items.flavorText: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

items.name: Scoped Shotgun
items.description: This weapon has an additional single-target attack that deals double damage and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} the target 5 cells away. For this attack, the minimal firing range is 2 cells, and the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g} is increased by +5.

items.name: Scorcher
items.description: The user gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and immediately resets cooldowns on all attacks and attack {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. At the start of the user's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} that lasts until the end of combat.
items.flavorText: A combat stimulant that brings forth monstrous rage and burns the nervous system to ash. Designed for the organic battle golems that serve the Janus Tech-Priests.

items.name: Scout Armour
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} is increased by +15%. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} doubles if the wearer has not moved during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} if wearer is in full cover.

items.name: Scrap Box
items.description: Immediately consumed, this item provides 50 {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g}.

items.name: Scrap Box
items.description: Immediately consumed, this item provides 50 {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g}.

items.name: Scrap Container
items.description: This item is immediately consumed, granting you 100 {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g}.

items.name: Scrap Container
items.description: This item is immediately consumed, granting you 100 {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g}.

items.name: Scrappy Autogun
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Scrappy Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Scribe Servo-Skull
items.flavorText: This servo-skull is designed to spread the glory and splendour of its mighty owner.

items.name: Scythe Artillery
items.description: A short-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} missile launcher, which fires 6 missiles, dealing 18 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per missile.

items.name: Scythe Missile Launcher Battery
items.description: A short-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} missile launcher, which fires 5 missiles, dealing 11 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per missile.

items.name: Scythe Twin-Linked Battery
items.description: A short-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g} missile launcher, which fires 10 missiles, dealing 18 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per missile.

items.name: Seal of Death
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with {g|f:e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}Blade Dance{/g}, other enemies adjacent to the wearer become staggered for 1 round.

items.name: Seal of the Purifier
items.description: Every time when more than 2 targets are {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wielder gains +{uip|Momentum|5b6bc935bd664ed0b35c7f128b193cc5} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

items.name: Secrets of the Forerunner
items.description: If any of the wearer's characteristics are more than 100, all characteristics that are less than 90 are increased by +10.

items.name: Seeker of the Weak
items.description: All enemies suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
items.flavorText: A mysterious Aeldari contraption fashioned into an exquisite decorative item. When activated, it uses inscrutable means to distort reality, altering the spatial and gravitational parameters of its surroundings in ways that cause the imminent death of its owner's enemies. Exactly how the unholy machine can tell them from its owner's allies remains beyond understanding.

items.name: Self-Calibrating Goggles
items.description: The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.

items.name: Self-Calibrating Helmet
items.description:
The wearer's successful single attacks inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} on the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} if the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
If the wearer attacks a stunned enemy, the nearest enemy becomes stunned as well.

items.name: Sensory-Motor Modulator
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, they gain +{uip|Penetration|c2d196acb09341a8a9796e59781823ed}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: Serrated Glimmersteel Blade
items.description: Each successful attack with this weapon increases the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect suffered by a target by +3.

items.name: Serrated Great Sword
items.description: On a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, this sword inflicts +1 stack of the laceration effect. For each stack of laceration, all attacks of this sword against the same target deal +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Serrated Mono-Knife
items.description: This knife has a chance to inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Servo-Gauntlets
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is reduced by −10%.
If the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is 60 or more, that penalty is reduced by −15% instead.

items.name: Severed Hand
items.description: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −30 penalty or suffer {g|f:4755bff66f544cf7bd9f5be37dad08db}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
items.flavorText: A dark curved blade crafted by the despicable Drukhari. This deadly weapon was claimed as a trophy in the battle of Dargonus.

items.name: Shadow Field
items.description: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}shadow field{/g} effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

items.name: Shadow Field Generator
items.description: Provides 70 points of protection for each sector. Provides the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} with the ability to generate a Drukhari {g|f:f9b2e0f3583a491c91ad19d72e2d2024}Shadow Field{/g}.

items.name: Shadow Lance
items.description: A long-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing 63 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Shadow Lance Turret
items.description: A medium ranged {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing 25 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Shadow of the Undying One
items.description: Whenever the wearer dodges or parries an enemy attack, the wearer gains +{uip|Momentum|6b8e32c8b2ae4c0c9e7e164b34a7389f} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Base armour property: +{unit_stat|WarhammerWeaponSkill|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.
items.flavorText: Holy armour inlaid with the bones of the pious man who called himself the Pure-Voiced Prophet.

items.name: Shadowguide Cloak
items.description: The wearer becomes the least {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} as long as they have no enemies or allies adjacent.

items.name: Shard of Bloodstone
items.description: At the beginning of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies in a 3-cell radius gain +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} for each common effect on this enemy.

items.name: Shard Shotgun
items.description: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this shotgun must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become poisoned, suffering {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (8) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Sharp Shot Stimulant
items.description: Grants +70% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and reduces {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −70% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Sharpshooter Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer performs a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} ranged attack from any {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, this attack gains +{uip|Pen|64b0f8074bab45d4850cbb3cd5bae3a7}% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Sharpshooter Rifle
items.description:
{g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}Deadeye shots{/g} fired by this rifle deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to larger enemies:
-<indent=5%>Hulking creatures (2×2 cells) suffer +5 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Enormous creatures (3×3 cells) suffer +10 damage.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Massive creatures (4×4 cells) suffer +15 damage.</indent>

items.name: Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

items.name: Shield of Unfaltering Will
items.description: The wielder's successful {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilise{/g} on the target.

items.name: Shield-Bearer's Boots
items.description: The wearer can use their {g|f:8c7d2be4225745e4911eb3c53c603b76}Assault Onslaught{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Shifting Combi-Tool
items.description: Grants +20 to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

items.name: Shimmering Emulsion
items.description: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

items.name: Shock Baton
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Shotgun
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Shredder Shotgun
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Shredder Shotgun
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Shroud of Dauntlessness
items.description: Whenever the wielder performs a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +6 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and {uip|THP|a70164cbc0e54e168449793ecc448367} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Signet Ring
items.description: Grants +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.

items.name: Silence of Sha'eil
items.description: Targets {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Silent Death
items.description: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma in combat, if they have more than 0 wounds, they immediately regain +{uip|Heal|3e54949b6a89465fa52cd37fb7fa7889} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Weapon Skill is more than 55.

items.name: Silent Verdict
items.description:
Death Cult weapon gains the following:
-<indent=5%>−{uip|Parry|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|Crit|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the wielder's critical hit chance for each attack they make. This bonus stacks until the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>
items.flavorText: This elegant blade, quenched in the blood of holy martyrs, fits perfectly in the hand. The black steel has been polished until the reflective gleam of the metal can be seen even in the dark.

items.name: Sinew-Weave Ring
items.description: Grants the wearer +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} and +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, but reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} by −5%.

items.name: Singed Cape
items.description: The wearer's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Veil Tear|3cbe5a2c28b049a9bc8e8e8ef4e447a6}%.

items.name: Singer of Fearsome Sagas
items.description: Attacks by this axe deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 5% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is applied to each enemy only once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
items.flavorText:
Faithful companion to the reaper
of scarlet battlefields,
Generously feeding
the earth with wicked life,
and Wolf's mercy on foe bestowing;
In the thunder of your armour-blows,
I hear the laughter of the Allfather,
and I rejoice.

items.name: Singing Retribution
items.description: This blade deals an additional +{uip|Damage|483093afe6d34109a1eba3000eec4d9a}% damage to enemies with more than 50% wounds.

items.name: Singing Spear
items.description: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} have a 50% chance not to increase {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Single Void Shield Array
items.description: Provides 80 points of protection for each sector.

items.name: Sinister Diary
items.description: Grants a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} and a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g}.
items.flavorText: This tome is full of terrifying descriptions recounting heretical magic experiments and twisted laws of the warp. Although it contains forbidden knowledge, to read through it is to welcome hideous visions into one's head.

items.name: Sire's Patronage
items.description:
The wearer can skip their turn to make an ally of their choice immune to all damage until the start of the wearer's next turn.
! Can only be used once per combat.

items.name: Skin Patch
items.description: Removes 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}.

items.name: Skirmisher Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, the wearer has a 25% chance to gain 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

items.name: Skjald's Furs
items.description: When the wearer kills an enemy, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is additionally increased by twice the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g}.

items.name: Slayer's Delight
items.description: Whenever the wearer performs a single-target attack with a two-handed {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, that attack deals +{uip|Damage|8ac68363db98446d904fd7b2824d47d4} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Slicing Symbol
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g}, {g|f:1d48dfb6002a48f68bee0b86c4b56dc4}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:e7836ee2419b46d68da401547aaf630c}Kick{/g}, they gain +{uip|MP|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +{uip|Momentum|8ac852460a084506b37b2c1d9e0b569d} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

items.name: Slick Bodyglove
items.description: This bodyglove grants the wearer +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against enemies with {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} lower than that of the wearer. Base armour property: +10% dodge against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

items.name: Slithering Slaughter
items.description: When enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this weapon suffer damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, they deal half of that damage to adjacent creatures.

items.name: Small Plasma Macro-Cannon
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} plasma {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 8 shots, dealing 10 damage per shot.

items.name: Smiter
items.description: This weapon ignores the targets' armour and deflection.

items.name: Sniper Gloves
items.description:
The wearer deals +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The wearer gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shots{/g}.

items.name: Sniper's Bravado
items.description: Whenever the wearer's single-shot ranged attack deals damage equal to or more than 25% of the target's maximum wounds, this attack randomly inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on that target for 1 round.

items.name: Solar Staff
items.description:
The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the {g|f:8a759cdc2b754309b1fb75397798fbf1}Inferno{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2.
<indent=5%>+15 Willpower</indent>

items.name: Soldier Aquila Pendant
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapon{/g} within {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} range, the target gains +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} effect.

items.name: Solid Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|27aa9039b55f42968d1891fc21fc7654}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

items.name: Solid Shield
items.description: The wielder gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and +{uip|Parry|27aa9039b55f42968d1891fc21fc7654}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.

items.name: Solid Shield Enarmes
items.description: The wearer can use {g|f:b7113e32083d4344ad172d296119d40c}Shield Swing{/g} with their shield against multiple enemies in the area. The wearer's shield attacks deal an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage.
items.flavorText: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

items.name: Sororitas Boots
items.description: The wearer raises {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} to 175 whenever they kill 5 enemies in a row in one {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Soulsiphon
items.description:
If used by a psyker, whenever this sword hits an enemy, veil degradation is reduced by −1.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Special Privilege
items.description: After leaving a {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area, the wielder retains its effects until they move into another {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} area.

items.name: Spiked Boots
items.description:
At the start of combat, the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4) on themselves.
Whenever the wearer performs an area {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they inflict bleeding (4) on all {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} creatures.
This area melee attack also deals +{uip|Damage|cdb2305218224a638cb83c6845ac4bb5}% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Spiked Gloves
items.description:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
If the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is less than or equal to the wearer's armour penetration, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4).

items.name: Spinner's Blade
items.description:
Death Cult weapon gains the following:
-<indent=5%>−{uip|Parry|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>+{uip|Crit|ed0e0de8990b41f7b4fdc6683a55f6f2}% to the wielder's critical hit chance for each attack they make. This bonus stacks until the end of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.</indent>

items.name: Spinner's Breastplate
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's Agility is more than 50 . Extra property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.

items.name: Spinner's Mask
items.description: If the wearer has 10 or more stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, they gain +1 resolve.
items.flavorText: This mask of a messenger of death is as worn as a burial shroud. The gaze of its impassive bony visage carries an unyielding promise: every life must end.

items.name: Spinner's Ritual Vestments
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}. Extra property: +{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
items.flavorText: The sight of a Bloodspun Web initiate's grim attire inspires terror in their enemies and pious trepidation in followers of the Undying One — for this bone armour, sheathed tightly in thin leather, identifies the wearer as a messenger of death itself.

items.name: Spinneret Webber
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Spirit Drape
items.description: The wearer's non-attack {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less during the wearer's first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat.
items.flavorText: A power device built from shards of Aeldari obelisks. The Rogue Trader received this xeno-artefact after pacifying the spirits on the agri-world of Janus.

items.name: Sslyth Greatsword
Sslyth Greatsword
Stabilising Bracers
items.description: When the wearer uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain +{uip|Damage|b7eaa3c6e7ce43698c04bf99b553b8cc} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

items.name: Stabilising Gauntlets
items.description: When the wearer uses {g|f:7a76af1ef02c4699b62db147e2b9a172}Run and Gun{/g}, they gain +{uip|Damage|91b5d75106034acc95435d4ed1cb03dc} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} and do not suffer winded.

items.name: Staff of Blood
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Syphon Life {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing level of this power. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

items.name: Staff of Crudarach
items.description: The wielder of this staff gains the Consign {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The wielder's divination {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} that affect one ally also affect the ally closest to the target. Divination psychic powers, including Consign, that affect one enemy also affect the enemy closest to the target. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Staff of Endless Flame
items.description:
The wielder of this staff (power level 7) gains the {g|f:8a759cdc2b754309b1fb75397798fbf1}Inferno{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1.
<indent=5%>+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}</indent>

items.name: Staff of Gravity Control
items.description: Enemies that begin their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} within the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer 14 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Staff of House Cassini
items.description: All allies targeted by Navigator powers gain +{uip|MP|62372fd20e0a462bb12a5ee406d6c1e9} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (7): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +7 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

items.name: Staff of House Orsellio
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Staff of Mindsight
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. Enemies suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} of the telepathy discipline used by the wielder. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Staff of Orsellio Guardian
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (5): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Staff of Orsellio Novator
items.description: The first use of each Navigator power in combat costs −1 less {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (10): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (6): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +6 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

items.name: Staff of Shock and Awe
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 18) gains the Lightning {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Staff of the Orsellio Regent
items.description: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the next attack that deals {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (7): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −7 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

items.name: Staff of the Righteous Pyre
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 15) gains the Emperor's Wrath {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and healing of this power. Sanctic {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} (including all versions of Emperor's Wrath) heal allies instead of damaging them. +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}

items.name: Staff of Unseen Chains
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 12) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} of this power. The first telekinesis power used by the wielder each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, does not increase the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Stalker Gloves
items.description: If the wearer's ranged attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, the wearer gains a +5% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} for the next ranged attack against the same enemy. Does not stack.

items.name: Stalking Boots
items.description: If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons equipped in both hands, their {g|f:f6d693dbff0d44eb9590684241e63ef3}Slash{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} makes an additional melee attack with the secondary weapon.

items.name: Stalwart Boots
items.description: The wearer and adjacent allies cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} and become immune to forced movement effects.

items.name: Standard-Issue Munitorum Sapper Shovel
items.description: This weapon deals +2 additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy adjacent to the wielder. Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon cannot make {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
items.flavorText: A metal tag, barely visible through the black, caked blood covering the handle, identifies the shovel's provenance as the armoury of the voidship Mourningstar.

items.name: Star Blight
items.description: This rifle inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} on the target.
items.flavorText: A cursed Drukhari weapon. Rather than energy beams or bolt charges, it strikes at foes with crystal cylinders, in which is sealed a deadly virus. The creator of this item was clearly after more than the mere death of their enemies: it had to be as cruel a death as possible.

items.name: Starbreaker Lance Weapon
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 32 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Starbreaker Lance Weapon
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 32 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Starbreaker Lance Weapon
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 32 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Starbreaker Lance Weapon (Prototype)
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 28 to 32)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Starflare Lance
items.description: A long-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 55 to 65)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Starflare Lance
items.description: A long-ranged {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 55 to 65)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Starmist Scarf
items.description:
If the wearer is not wearing any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, at the start of combat, they gain +{uip|Dodge|96494fc91a0d4278867c882487cd6551}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +2.

items.name: Steel Guidance
items.description:
The wearer gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
Whenever the wearer targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, that ally gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Steel Triad
items.description:
There are three copies of this shield.
The wielder gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} based on the number of adjacent allies wielding the Steel Triad:
-<indent=5%>1 ally: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, +10% {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>2 allies: the {g|f:ebfe1f63501a4134962d0b2ff6ab6655}Combat Master{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}, +10% block, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} suffered reduced by −30%</indent>

items.name: Stella Neutrona
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Overpenetration{/g} chance is increased by +50%. On overpenetration, damage dealt by this weapon suffers no penalties.

items.name: Stimm
items.description: The user immediately gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. For the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} their MP and AP are reduced by −2.

items.name: Stimulant Injector
items.description: This item reduces {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} by −10%, yet increases critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +{uip|Crit|c6f507162cd04d8d9d175cd66a73f995}%.

items.name: Stinger Ring
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:8d027d39ba084d95ac87af84b59c9029}Stinger Shot{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Stolen Breath
items.description:
Whenever the wearer's ally dies (their wounds drop to 0) in combat, the wearer immediately gains +5 Weapon Skill and +5 Ballistic Skill until the end of combat.
Additionally, if the wearer has Conviction — Heretic, they gain +10 Toughness. Stacks.
items.flavorText: This artefact from the collection of Bartholomeus Ort resembles a gemstone covered in a delicate web of fine cracks. The words, "Make another's pain your weapon," are scratched along the edge.

items.name: Strange Shard
items.description: Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreXenos}Lore (Xenos){/g}.
items.flavorText: A piece of wraithbone that serves as a reminder of the eerie ritual used to banish the spirits of Janus.

items.name: Strangler Webber
items.description:
In addition to the webber attack effects, the target suffers a −20 penalty to Weapon Skill and cannot perform attacks of opportunity. These penalties last for 2 rounds.
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Stronghold
items.description: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}blocks{/g} an attack, they gain {uip|THP|6b8bc6de6c6d41d1b38d83296d59396f} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

items.name: Stun Grenade
items.description: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

items.name: Stun Grenade
items.description: The grenade emits a blinding flash of light and a loud blast. Creatures caught in that blast must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|dc1eb1001219401c89028766dd8b5de4} penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 turn. On a successful test, creatures suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

items.name: Stupor
items.description: Whenever a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} from this weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}, the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Sturdy Shield Straps
items.description: The wearer's successful counterattacks triggered by {g|f:f6a60b4556214528b0ce295c4f69306e}Stalwart Defence{/g} always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} and deal +25% more critical damage.

items.name: Sturdy Shotgun
items.description: The wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is increased by +{uip|Critical Hit Chance|7c4174fdd62040fcb6e48ca751ef635b}% and {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} — by +{uip|Penetration|7c4174fdd62040fcb6e48ca751ef635b}% against adjacent targets.

items.name: Stygian-Pattern Dual-Module Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g} with two autonomous aiming modules. Fire 2 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot. Can be used twice per turn

items.name: Stygies-Pattern Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Stygies-Pattern Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Stygies-Pattern Macro-Battery
items.description: Short-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 4 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Suin Kaelean
items.description: When this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, the target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Test{/g} with a −35 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: Sunhammer Lance Battery
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 60 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a wide {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Sunhammer Lance Battery
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 60 to 70)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a wide {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Swashbuckler Cloak
items.description: Whenever the wearer has two {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons equipped, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and +15% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g}.

items.name: Swashbuckler's Goggles
items.description: The wearer's shots in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g} have a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}.

items.name: Sweet Perdition
items.description: On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}: if the target is suffering from {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} and fails the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, it suffers an additional <u>(from 15 to 20)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}.
items.flavorText: An exquisite shardcarbine. It is light enough to be wielded by the great raptor of Commorragh's skies: the Scourge. Now it belongs to a more worthy wielder.

items.name: Swift Shadows
items.description: Once per turn, after the wearer uses {g|f:a29aa37a4db3485fb5a0ee7b7515e0dd}Blood Oath{/g} or {g|f:3774147440ac412a876725b9b2b24682}Oath of Vengeance{/g}, they gain +1 use of {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, costing 0 AP, until the end of their turn.

items.name: Swiftshroud Cloak
items.description:
Whenever the wearer is targeted by an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of the swiftshroud effect and +{uip|Dodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against this attack.
Also, the wearer gains +{uip|MP|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} every time they are targeted by an attack of opportunity.
At the end of their turn, the wearer expends all their swiftshroud stacks to grant all allies +{uip|AllyDodge|47ef5ac73a7b424e91767416f3612116}% dodge until the wearer's next turn.

items.name: Sword
Sword of Faith
Sworddancer Cloak
items.description: Each time the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|Crit|2e62de08f5a3452a98526b3771009a6e}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Swordsman Bodyglove
items.description: While the wearer has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} are increased by +{uip|Dodge|b3efe0523fb34b6fbf6ab9fdd4b03cb3}%. Base armour property: +10% dodge if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 50.

items.name: Sworn Protector
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Adherent.
Grants the wielder +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} for each enemy killed until the end of combat.

items.name: Symphony of Pain
items.description: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer a random common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Synaptic Coagulator
items.description: The wearer gains +15 Intelligence. At the start of their turn, they suffer 1 direct damage.
items.flavorText: This mysterious device is a gift from Lady Xue. It considerably enhances its owner's cognitive abilities, so long as they can endure the pain that comes with connecting to the mechanism.

items.name: Synskin
items.description: Base armour property: +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} is more than 40.
items.flavorText: Once sprayed onto the body, it protects from environmental factors and enhances fighting skills.

items.name: Synth-Feed
items.description: If the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with any adjacent familiar, that familiar regains +{uip|Wounds|6f5225ff33c34371b2b38f352e46fcbd} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Tactica Imperialis Excerpt
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Critical damage{/g} dealt by the wearer with pistols is increased by +{uip|Crit Damage|a631996f6cf54d109fb694e8785cf2f0}% if their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g} is 150 or greater.

items.name: Tactical Backpack
items.description: This backpack grants its wearer a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count for any weapon capable of {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks.

items.name: Tactical Boots
items.description: Whenever an enemy attempts to make an attack of opportunity against the wearer, that enemy is pushed back by 1 cell before the attack is able to hit the wearer.

items.name: Tactical Cloak
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. These effects do not stack.

items.name: Tactical Genius
items.description: Whenever the wearer blocks, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} is increased by +10.

items.name: Tactical Goggles
items.description:
+5% to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}
+3% to {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}

items.name: Tactical Vox-Transmitter
items.description: If the wearer is the Arbitrator with the Castigator specialisation, their Castigator {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} range is increased by +1 cell.

items.name: Tainted Phylactery
items.description: The wielder gains +{uip|Crit|95ac0cecf5734d32a8b273896b24a9c3}% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against xenos.
items.flavorText: A mysterious xeno-object which belonged to the Magus of the abominable Genestealer Cult from the hive world of Dargonus.

items.name: Tamer of the Empyrean
items.description: If psychic phenomena or perils of warp are triggered, the wearer gains +1 psy rating during their next turn.
items.flavorText: A mysterious piece of archeotech found among the treasures of Captain Bartholomeus Ort. It is engraved with the words "Even a raging wave can lift you higher."

items.name: Target Designator
items.description: Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g}, it reduces the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} by −1 and applies +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: Targeting Visor
items.description: Increases the wearer's chances to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets at a range of 10 or further by 20%.

items.name: Tarnished Breacher's Aquila
items.description: Enemies within the wearer's area of attack suffer −{uip|INTBdiv2|3a5a0a9ea11c47a4b6a7028396ae1291}% dodge, and allies within the wearer's area of attack gain +{uip|INTBdiv2|3a5a0a9ea11c47a4b6a7028396ae1291}% dodge for 1 round.

items.name: Tarvanna's Last Stand
items.description: This power axe deals +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} if the wielder has less than 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

items.name: Tear-Blade Gloves
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +1% for every 2% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost.

items.name: Tearing Vengeance
items.description:
This power axe deals an additional +{uip|Damage|89a56b94dbac479f961ee8727040b945} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The first attack each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} against a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} target restores +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} to the wielder.
The wielder suffers 6 damage every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Tears of Repentance
items.description:
All creatures that enter the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} created by this grenade must pass Strength, Toughness, and Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with a −{uip|Penalty|2b150176c39a438f8db2c203e8202f4c} penalty.
-<indent=5%>On a failed Toughness test the target becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Strength test — {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
-<indent=5%>On a failed Willpower test — {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} for 2 rounds.</indent>
items.flavorText: A gas grenade that releases a cloud of acrid tear gas and blinds enemies.

items.name: Telekineticist's Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Bind {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Telepath's Staff
items.description: The wielder of this staff (power level 9) gains the Vision of Death {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}

items.name: Tempestus Carapace
items.description: Base armour property: +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

items.name: Tempestus Carapace Elite Backpack
items.description:
While the wearer's weapon has a base {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} or strike count equal to <u>(from 2 to 4)</u>, that parameter is increased by +{uip|RoF|10d27d1253ac42148b8b016e3765fb57}. If it is a ranged weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} is doubled.
While the wearer's weapon has 5 or more base rate of fire or strike count, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attacks is increased by +{uip|Burst|10d27d1253ac42148b8b016e3765fb57}%. If it is a ranged weapon, its recoil is negated.

items.name: Terrorax Slayer
items.description: This rifle's {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} costs +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more and deals triple {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against large targets (size 2×2 cells and larger).

items.name: Tesla Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 40 to 50)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} with 60% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.

items.name: Tesla Ring
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:ce7a4216b83c4fc0950478938b6122a2}Tesla Shot{/g} once per combat.

items.name: Thassertium Mask
items.description:
The wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Persuasion{/g}.
If {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} is triggered and a daemon is summoned, that daemon attacks the closest to it non-daemon target.
items.flavorText: A mask studded all over with sparkling thassertium.

items.name: Thassertium Necklace
items.description: Whenever the wearer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, they gain +{uip|Temp Wounds|d30eeebc490b4fdc8c26be44ffa1bf6a} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and do not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Whenever perils of the warp is triggered, a daemon is summoned.
items.flavorText: A splendid golden necklace adorned with skilfully polished, sparkling thassertium.

items.name: The Ashen Breath
items.flavorText: The weapon of a wrathful leader from the Aeldari corsairs, taken as a trophy by the Imperial Navy and later stolen from a secret arsenal by Kasballica agents.

items.name: The Dark Marchesa
items.description: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.
items.flavorText: A cogni-weapon inhabited by a bloodthirsty machine spirit famous for its ferocity and fondness for slaughter.

items.name: The Distortion
items.description:
Each area attack made with this weapon increases veil degradation by +{uip|Range|4f53637d66ef4414a96f50a7a22b7026} and deals +{uip|Damage|4f53637d66ef4414a96f50a7a22b7026}% more damage.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: The Exploder
items.description: Whenever the wielder kills a target with this hand flamer, the target explodes, dealing {uip|Damage|867dd79aad8443dd9b978a99f6dfe744} {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} to all creatures in a 2-cell radius and applies {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (9).

items.name: The Glow of Dead Stars
items.description: {g|f:2a5d173c50af4cfd86eb00b12848b450}Plasma Explosion{/g} caused by this weapon affects targets in a 2-cell radius. The type of damage dealt to each target, aside from the wielder, is taken as {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp{/g} damage.

items.name: The Guardian Crown
items.description:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +{uip|Wounds|85550dbb1dcf417ead0cf866b3ed7b8d} wounds.
items.flavorText: Cogni-armour controlled by a wise and caring machine spirit. It dutifully monitors the wearer's physical condition and, whenever necessary, promptly injects a dose of regenerating stimulants into their arteries.

items.name: The Hammer of Epiphany
items.description: All {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt when this weapon {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy is increased by +100%.
items.flavorText: A sacred weapon of the Order of Hammer crafted in the image of Piety's Charge, the hammer wielded by Saint Cognatius. Only the staunchest allies of the Order may have the honour of carrying this emblem of faith into battle.

items.name: The Hand of Avolius
items.description:
After a successful attack, these gauntlets grant the wearer a 50% chance to inflict the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} effect on enemies that fail a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Adherent, the test is made with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}.
items.flavorText: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

items.name: The Hand of Xenocide
items.description: This weapon deals +{uip|Damage|db50fd1f18244abdaa946cacbdca880d}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to xenos enemies.
items.flavorText: A relic axe of the Omnissiah, deadly combination of both weapon and tool, that served Magos Domina Philaxalta in eradicating a race of blasphemous xenos inhabiting the worlds in the Rifts of Hecaton. This great feat was the Explorator Cognisance Fleet's first military victory.

items.name: The Hunter-Father's Armour
items.description: The wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and the {g|f:4824d61c41f74e13be50391caf7f413f}Strike of Kurnous{/g} ability.

items.name: The Last Flash
items.description: Whenever an enemy makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the wearer, that enemy must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

items.name: The One Star
items.description: Whenever the wearer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or kills an enemy, the wearer's damage dealt is increased by +5%. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
items.flavorText: This set of Adepta Sororitas power armour once belonged to Saint Argenta herself, who is revered both in the Calixis Sector and the Koronus Expanse alike. The warrior who dons this armour becomes a great and merciless weapon against the enemies of the Imperium.

items.name: The One Star
items.description: After using a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g}, the wearer immediately uses {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} (regardless of its {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}). Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.
items.flavorText: This set of Adepta Sororitas power armour once belonged to Saint Argenta herself, who is revered both in the Calixis Sector and the Koronus Expanse alike. The very sight of this majestic armour ignites the fire of faith in the human soul.

items.name: The Princess of Efreet
items.description: If the wearer is a Cold Trader, they gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
items.flavorText: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

items.name: The Rack
items.description: The wielder can make a free attack with this weapon if they shot from {g|f:48f5a4051c0c4cf691c84cb27b6876a3}the Ruin{/g} on the same {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: The Ripper
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: The Roar
items.description: Targets hit by this rifle are forced to move 2 cells away from the shooter.

items.name: The Ruin
items.description: The wielder can make a free attack with this weapon if they shot from {g|f:414a941ed21c4602a2b4555f43b811df}the Rack{/g} on the same {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: The Slow March of Death
items.description: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, {g|f:7daf9f9d4c3d44ccaeebb0b9a7725b54}Danse Macabre{/g}, {g|f:9b09708aa0c244a6bc4a8e46d69c5884}Dash{/g}, or {g|f:c3d6e29e74e440a79cb243e4e93e0501}Death From Above{/g}, the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|Damage|ddc5a202a550411d9a23e1d13f1d8ddb}% until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks up to 3 times.

items.name: The Spider's Web
items.description:
This webber's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} cost 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
If this weapon's {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilises{/g} a target, it must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: The Vial of Falstow
items.description:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
items.flavorText: As he watched the fall of the shrine world Igrimont from orbit, Saint Falstow shed mournful tears, which were collected in a sacred vial and placed in the reliquary.

items.name: Theodora's Rosary
items.description: The wearer of this amulet gains a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCommerce}Commerce{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreImperium}Lore (Imperium){/g}.

items.name: They Shall Weep
items.description: Each shot with this bolter deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c31185d9515d4727aae60696c6fa96b9} {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} with 40% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to all characters adjacent to the target.

items.name: Thorn Klaive
items.description: When the wielder deals damage with this weapon, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

items.name: Thought Guide
items.description:
Allies of the wielder affected by psychic powers gain +{uip|Resolve|7d24ba5d71364a87ae9d1b7071b5bcd3} resolve for 1 round.
<indent=5%>+10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}</indent>

items.name: Thrice-Pioneer's Bracers
items.description: Every time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} is reduced by −5 for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Stacks up to 6 times.

items.name: Thunder Bearer
items.description: The wearer suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}. Once the wearer takes damage for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, this armour unleashes a lightning strike, dealing {uip|Damage|812207c99d794fe9a525dc5ba6d18132} damage to all creatures in a 2-cell radius. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

items.name: Thunder Hammer
items.description: Maces and hammers have a special attack that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} enemies away.

items.name: Thunderstrike Macro-Cannons
items.description: Short-range {g|Encyclopedia:DorsalSpace}dorsal{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 2 shots, dealing 21 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Tiara of the Immaterium
items.description: The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and suffers −50% less {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

items.name: Titanforge Lance Weapon
items.description: Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 84 to 98)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.
items.flavorText: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

items.name: Titanforge Lance Weapon
items.description: Long-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 84 to 98)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a narrow {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.
items.flavorText: This weapon design was developed in the Calixis Sector and boasts firepower greatly superior to that of the more humble Starbreakers, which were designed as imperfect copies and are manufactured only on minor industrial worlds. Only truly enlightened artisans can reproduce such an exalted weapon.

items.name: Tome of Excess
items.description: Grants +10 to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}, but the wielder suffers +{uip|Damage|2339239546f843d5ad3b0ed2065483f8}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from psychic and Navigator powers.

items.name: Torment Bracelets
items.description: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

items.name: Tormentor of the Chastened
items.description: This weapon deals an additional +1 base damage for each common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} and each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} on the target.

items.name: Torpedo Tubes (Unguided Melta)
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} capable of firing 5 heavy-loaded melta torpedoes with 50 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} warheads.

items.name: Torturer
items.description: This weapon deals +30% more damage to {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} targets and +20% more damage to {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} targets.

items.name: Toxic Flamer
items.description: This flamer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} at the same level as {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} is inflicted.

items.name: Toxin Grenade
items.description:
This grenade creates a toxic zone until the end of combat.
Each unit within that zone is dealt 50 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}.

items.name: Tracking Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer's {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} is triggered, the wearer gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for this extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Traitor's Ring
