items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:f49c29f6ecbe43acae9a0aa30fab0494}Liquifier Shot{/g} once per combat.
items.flavorText: An exquisite ring augmetic that conceals the tiniest thorn-like blade within. Such an accessory could be a lethal weapon in the right hands.

items.name: Trampled Cult Banner
items.description: Enemies that are targeted by the wearer's psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −15 penalty or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10) and {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}.
items.flavorText: A torn banner of the Cult of the Final Dawn collected as a trophy off the body of one of their leaders in the uprising on Vheabos VI.

items.name: Trapper's Furs
items.description: Each time the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy with a ranged attack from a range of 5 cells or further, the wearer becomes the highest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for this enemy until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Triple Void Shield Array
items.description: Provides 190 points of protection for each sector.

items.name: Triumph and Fury
items.description:
A serpent of embossed lines coils around the barrels of these holy weapons, a complete chronicle of the exploration of the systems called the Lathe Worlds by the servants of the Omnissiah.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 5 shots, dealing 30 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Triumph of Faith
items.description: This sword ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
items.flavorText: A weapon that once belonged to the Pure-Voiced Prophet and was eventually presented to the Rogue Trader of House von Valancius.

items.name: Triumph of Retribution
items.description:
Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this weapon, veil degradation is reduced by −{uip|Damage|141f119fbbc54b08abc49f74786e9ca5}.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Triumph of the Stalwart
items.description: When attacking xenos and daemons with this flamer, the power of {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} inflicted by its attacks is increased by +20.

items.name: Trophy Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Twin-Linked Lascannons
items.description: A bow-mounted ball turret armed with lascannons.

items.name: Twin-Linked Lascannons
items.description: A bow-mounted ball turret armed with lascannons.

items.description: A bow-mounted ball turret armed with lascannons.

items.description: A bow-mounted ball turret armed with lascannons.

items.name: Twin-Linked Lascannons
items.description: A bow-mounted ball turret armed with lascannons.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description: Solid projectile weapons have an increased (+50%) {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description: Flame weapons have 2 special area attacks with different areas of effect.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.

items.name: Two-handed ranged
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Tyrant
items.description: This pistol inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10), {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (10), and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} (10) on its targets.

items.name: Undertaker
items.description: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

items.name: Undertaker
items.description: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

items.name: Undertaker
items.description: Whenever any creature in combat suffers lethal damage from {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the wielder deals +30% more damage with this weapon for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

items.name: Undying Rage
items.description: Each {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} performed by the wearer increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by {uip|Damage|de2e68accff14522b70e444df5560b33}% until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Unfading Valour
items.flavorText: This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

items.name: Unhallowed Bellow
items.description: A successful hit with this weapon randomly applies one of the following {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
items.flavorText: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

items.name: Unholy Relics
items.description: This amulet grants the wielder a +20 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} and a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence} Intelligence{/g}.

items.name: Unholy Shard
items.description: This amulet reduces all {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g} suffered by its wearer by −50%. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary, they also heal {uip|Wounds|cd2014fc37a44fe58e20a68f7f3ee4e2} wounds each time they suffer toxic {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Unquenchable Fury
items.description: The maximum {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}push{/g} distance of this maul is 5 cells, and any collision damage is increased by +50%.
items.flavorText: An extremely heavy power maul. Its handle is covered in litanies of fury spurring the wielder to exterminate the enemies of Humanity without mercy.

items.name: Unshakeable Tenet
items.description: The wielder of this bolter has a 10% chance to regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} after a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. If AP was regained this way for the first time this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, this attack has no {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}.

items.name: Unsleeping Eye
items.description: When the wearer kills an enemy with the {g|f:e627e3fb653840dab9661093828432c5}Finish the Job{/g} ability, the wearer gains a +20% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} on their {g|f:874c1ff6e51945a0ae4d4e33f3dc1b49}Orchestrated Firestorm{/g} and {g|f:7a6c78a5bc854a2b95aa9b3cc3e2a094}Last Volley{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}

items.name: Unstable Flamer
items.description: Flame weapons have 2 special area attacks with different areas of effect.

items.name: Untainted Sacrament
items.description: The wielder suffers −75% less mental and {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

items.name: Untuning Combi-Tool
items.description:
This item grants its owner a +25 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.
If the owner has medium or heavy {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} equipped, at the start of their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} in combat, they gain +{uip|Armour|326c14c03f8a44829037d9319ccaa6a9}% armour.

items.name: Unyielding Vanguard Boots
items.description: These boots double the {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} bonus that the allies gain from the wearer's {g|f:fc83a8ac57e54db59c3bb70083dc385c}Unyielding Beacon{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

items.name: Uralon's Accursed Crozius
items.description:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

items.name: Uralon's Accursed Crozius
items.description:
On a successful {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} with this crozius, all of the wielder's allies gain +5 to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against the target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
After the wielder deals damage with this crozius, each of the wielder's allies performs an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g} against the target.

items.name: Veilrender
items.description:
Each critical hit scored with this sword increases veil degradation by +{uip|Range|b80f6440487547fb8f3ab4e85bed493a}. The next attack with this sword deals +{uip|Damage|b80f6440487547fb8f3ab4e85bed493a} more damage.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Venom Chainmail
items.description: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} deal an additional +10 {g|Encyclopedia:ToxicDamage}toxic damage{/g}. If the wearer was attacked with an attack of opportunity, the attacker also suffers toxic {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Base armour property: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}.

items.name: Vessel of Tech-Leprosy
items.description:
Deals <u>(from 50 to 100)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}.
It also inflicts +2 stacks of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} until the end of combat.
At the start of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, it gains an additional +1 stack of perplexed.
items.flavorText: A devastating weapon that contains the horrors of the tech-leprosy strain found in the bowels of a Kiava Gamma manufactorum.

items.name: Victim's Sorrow
items.description: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target that is in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} with a ranged attack, this attack always scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

items.name: Vid-Capture Relay
items.description: Whenever the wearer's ally under the effect of the {g|f:6f6d2e22b4e744dd9e777b769c1aa167}Joint Analysis{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, the wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.

items.name: Vigilance
items.description: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:795d08dee468444aa7594ccd70cce165}Melta Scorching Shot{/g} once per combat.
items.flavorText: A magnificent ring holding a deadly plasma charge, gifted to the Rogue Trader. It saved Reverend Hieronymus from assassins not once but twice.

items.name: Vindictor Flamer
items.description: Flame weapons have 2 special area attacks with different areas of effect.

items.name: Vindictor Flamer
items.description: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

items.name: Vindictor Flamer
items.description: A hybrid of a flamer and a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} chain weapon. Thanks to the latter, the wielder can {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} with this weapon. Their melee {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} is also increased by +25%.

items.name: Virtue of Contempt
items.description: Each time the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} from flamers, that burning level is doubled.

items.name: Virtuous Vindication
items.description:
On {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, targets must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
If they fail, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (24) and {g|Encyclopedia:MeltingEffect}melting{/g}. Additionally, they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If they pass, they suffer burning (8) and melting.

items.name: Viscous Solution
items.description: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, but suffers −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}.

items.name: Visor of Inevitability
items.description:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect, they gain +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 10 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|691d6631ddd84d488c7a6703178adb4a} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

items.name: Visor of Inevitable Retribution
items.description:
Whenever the wearer inflicts a damage-over-time effect or kills an enemy, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} effect.
As soon as the wearer gains 6 stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g}, they deal {uip|Damage|89ac7aeab03b4556b6c972889e6e4b3d} direct damage to all enemies suffering from any damage-over-time effects, and all the stacks of {g|f:1f2465a9a0ce4c34a2b8de41e70a1210}inevitability{/g} are removed.

items.name: Vivisector's Visor
items.description:
The wearer's single attacks on an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} deal an additional +<u>(20% of the target's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} on an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} deals an additional +<u>(30% of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g})</u>% damage.

items.name: Voice of Paduvian
items.flavorText: This glorious blade is forged from the wreckage of the Great Bell of the shrine world Paduvian, whose formidable voice rang out with implacable zeal but was silenced when the vile dogs of Uralon the Cruel consigned Paduvian to the flame.

items.name: Void Veteran Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with their melee attack, they immediately gain +1 use of {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} costing 0 AP (even if they do not have this ability).

items.name: Voidborn's Pride
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, their Medicae increases by +{uip|Medicae|c4e473f447764098a8e25512a8d540ea} until the end of combat. Stacks.
items.flavorText: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

items.name: Voidsunder Lance Battery
items.description: Medium-range {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapon{/g} dealing <u>(from 91 to 105)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} to a chosen enemy within a wide {g|Encyclopedia:FiringArcSpace}firing arc{/g}.

items.name: Volition Inhibitor
items.description: When the wearer uses {g|f:ba56eecb14dc4793a604c28017307500}Controlled Shot{/g}, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

items.name: Voltagheist Field Emitter
items.description:
The wearer suffers −{uip|Resist|b0e7b907907b44fe948e142a93add87e}% less impact and {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g}.
When the wearer suffers impact or energy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, the attacking enemy suffers {uip|Damage|b0e7b907907b44fe948e142a93add87e} {g|Encyclopedia:PowerDamage}power damage{/g}.

items.name: Von Valancius Cloak
items.description: While the wearer is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}.

items.name: Vortex Pendant
items.description: The wearer gains +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} each time they choose an ally or themselves as a target of an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This effect remains until the end of combat. Stacks.

items.name: Voss-Pattern Torpedo Tubes (Plasma)
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} capable of firing 4 plasma torpedoes with 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} warheads.

items.name: Voss-Pattern Torpedo Tubes (Plasma)
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} capable of firing 4 plasma torpedoes with 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} warheads.

items.name: Votary of the Lex Imperialis
items.description: Shotguns knock enemies back when shot at {g|Encyclopedia:Range}effective range{/g}.
items.flavorText: The name on the grip of this shotgun has all but faded. This weapon once belonged to a member of the Adeptus Arbites. Judging by the many chips and dents, it served them long and well by ending the lives of hundreds of Lex violators.

items.name: Vox-Beacon
items.description: If the wearer is the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, their first Overseer {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Vox-Whistle
items.description: It's just a trinket, but whenever familiars hear the sound of this vox-whistle, they behave erratically. Still, it does not affect their combat capabilities.

items.name: W-240 Passive Detection Arrays
items.description:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 85% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
This is a low-emission augur, which makes the voidship more difficult for enemies to hit, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} by +15%.
items.flavorText:
This augur system is connected to the mighty cogitation blocks offered by the Explorators as a gift to the Rogue Trader. Their computing power is so great that the augurs can pick up even the slightest vulnerabilities in enemy defences.
~// Enemies suffer −10% to their {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g}

items.name: Wanderer's Portent
items.description: The wielder can only perform {g|Encyclopedia:DeadeyeShot}deadeye shot{/g} attacks with this weapon. Whenever they kill an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} using this weapon, they gain an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Warlord's Amulet
items.description: Grants +{unit_stat|WarhammerIntelligence|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the wearer and their allies.

items.name: Warmonger Boots
items.description: Whenever the wearer kills 2 or more enemies with a single attack, the attack does not spend all of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

items.name: Warp Conductor Gloves
items.description:
After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}:
-<indent=5%>Wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1 until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} and temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.</indent>
Can only be equipped by an unsanctioned psyker.

items.name: Warp Grenade
items.description:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot
Deals <u>(from 30 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}.

items.name: Warp Guide Staff
items.description: Allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

items.name: Warp Reflex Ring
items.description: After triggering a {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomenon{/g}, the wearer immediately restores {uip|Wounds|2fad967b07a043969528c310d52d43ac} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|PsyRating} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. After triggering {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, the wearer immediately gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

items.name: Warp Seer's Goggles
items.description: Grants +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillLoreWarp}Lore (Warp){/g}.
items.flavorText: Makes the sharp touch of warp less suffocating.

items.name: Warp Surge Brooch
items.description: On their first non-{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} in combat, the wearer gains a number of additional attacks equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

items.name: Warp-Focusing Staff
items.description: Enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer +11% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources. This effect stacks up to {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} times. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (11): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −11 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +15 Perception

items.name: Warrior Armour
items.description: While the wearer has less than 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} is increased by +25, and {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} by +25%. Base armour property: +{uip|Armour|a68758571233479bb5685943e58a5c2c}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

items.name: Wasteland Generator
items.description:
This ancient component of a Dargonus-fleet frigate was discovered in the wastes by the Engine Vandals and presented to the Rogue Trader.
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoLaunchersSpace}Torpedo tubes{/g} capable of firing 5 short-burning plasma torpedoes with 19 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} warheads.

items.name: Wasteland Twister
items.flavorText: An ancient weapon that once belonged to the leader of the Engine Vandals, roamers of Dargonus wastelands.

items.name: Watcher From Above
items.description:
The wielder of this sword gains a +25% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and a +25% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.
Enemies {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this sword suffer a −25 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} until the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
items.flavorText: This venerable sword was wielded by the most honourable agri-prince Illumian Vyatt ab Aram, who served as a paladin to the governor of Janus four centuries ago. In the darkest hours, during the rebellion of the dastardly sect of the Anointed by Earth, the glorious Illumian saved his patron from the rabble who had stormed the palace and quelled the rebellion by slaking the thirst of this noble blade with peasant blood.

items.name: Weakness Detector
items.description: If the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat.

items.name: Wear-Resistant Boots
items.description: Grant +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and +{uip|Dodge|337dc2d4ce7648e4a2f7998a14aa71cb}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

items.name: Webber
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Webber
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Weighty Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Well-Maintained Axe
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.

items.name: Well-Maintained Heavy Rock Saw
items.description: Each attack with this heavy rock saw performs several strikes. If the first strike hits the target, all subsequent strikes automatically hit. If the first strike is dodged or parried, all subsequent strikes are automatically dodged or parried.

items.name: Well-Maintained Lasgun
items.description: Laser weapons are effective against targets in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} and targets with high {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}.

items.name: Well-Maintained Webber
items.description:
Targets hit by this weapon must pass an Agility resistance test or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} for 1 round.
At the end of its turn, the affected target must pass an Agility resistance test to remove the effect or suffer direct damage equal to <u>target's AGI bonus</u>.

items.name: Whispering Mercy
items.description: This blade deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c4ae9d253c654ac5804f7a9bdd49bb61}% damage to enemies with less than 50% wounds.

items.name: White Signet of the Inquisition
items.description: The wearer gains +15 Persuasion and the {g|f:247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}Inquisitor's Command{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This ability can only be used once per combat.
items.flavorText: This ring symbolises its owner's closeness to the Lord Inquisitor, which inspires the owner's companions and adds weight to their orders.

items.name: Will to Live
items.description:
Enemies adjacent to the wielder have their Toughness reduced by −{uip|Range|c88058271fb1472c8c54a63b68f43a40}. The wielder gains +{uip|Range|c88058271fb1472c8c54a63b68f43a40} Toughness for each adjacent enemy.
This sword deals an additional +{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}{uip|Damage|fd5c99b0b98543938875fa3c17294b71}{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Windrunner Boots
items.description:
Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer for the first time in {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer immediately gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with 3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
The wearer does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} during this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Witch Staff
items.description: This staff gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} for every level of the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}.

items.name: Withering Shard
items.description:
The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} are decreased by −15.
The wearer can use {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic acts{/g} at 125 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} instead of 175 and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measures{/g} at +50 momentum higher (capped at 100 momentum).
The wearer is considered as having {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent if they do not yet have it.

items.name: Woebringer
items.description: This weapon has an additional attack that pushes enemies away. If an enemy cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, the wielder is pushed away instead. This attack deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
items.flavorText: A blade found on a drifting ship whose crew had been slaughtered by a mysterious xenos. Holding its hilt braided with warm, still-living skin, your ears ring with the lamentations of the dying.

items.name: Wolf Pelt Cloak
items.description:
Grants +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
As long as the wearer has performed both {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, every enemy in a 5-cell radius that is smaller than the wearer suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. Stacks.

items.name: Wolf Tooth Necklace
items.description: The wearer gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} while they have 85% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} or more.

items.name: Wolfskin
items.description: Base Armour Property: +20 Strength.
items.flavorText: Armour covered in magical runes and sanctified by an Iron Priest. It belongs to brother Ulfar, an honourable warrior of the Wolf Guard.

items.name: Wraithbone Grenade
items.description:
Deals <u>(from 8 to 10)</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and inflicts +6 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, –1 stack of disturbed is removed every round.
Additionally, this grenade reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1 until the end of combat. This effect does not stack.

items.name: Wraithbone Necklace
items.description: Grants +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. ! For Asuryani and Drukhari only.

items.name: Wraithbone Woven Battlesuit
items.description: This {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} restores {uip|Wounds|4dff23a7cc4d430b91bfa8b1b5cfc20d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} each round when the wearer has any number of the following damage-over-time effects: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}. Base armour property: +10% armour against non-Drukhari enemies.

items.name: Wraithdancer Garments
items.description: Each time anyone uses a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} in combat, the wearer gains +1 stack of the {g|f:8b6b420e5fad4cb3a0851ebf21ace3a8}wraithdance{/g} effect.

items.name: Wrath of Saint Drusus
items.description: Does not have an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}. Increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources against any {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} targets by +15% until the end of combat. Does not stack.

items.name: Wrath of the Vile Rabble
items.description: Axes have a special attack that inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.
items.flavorText: This weapon belonged to the infamous rebel and trouble-monger Sekt, exiled to Vheabos VI for inciting sedition and becoming the first champion of its gladiatorial arenas. He retained that status for sixty-two cycles.

items.name: Wrathful Mask
items.description:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.
The wearer's incoming {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −{uip|Coercion|5a3e97bd4fc7462699fa4d79f7080879}% if the attacker does not have {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeSuperiority}melee superiority{/g}.
items.flavorText: An unusual mask made of red metal. The mouth is twisted into a scowl, its lips torn in such a way that they resemble fangs.

items.name: Wych's Last Cry
items.description: At the start of combat, the wearer gains the effect of the {g|f:adb64abd9fc745089b628b9a31d15dca}combat stimm: serpentin{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

items.name: Wych's Scorn
items.description: The wearer suffers no damage from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Base armour property: +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against non-Drukhari enemies.

items.name: X-38 Auspex Multi-Band
items.description:
Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 90% hit chance and 10% critical hit chance.
Additionally, provides allies with targeting data, increasing their {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g}' and {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}' damage by +20% and hit chance by +30%.

items.name: X-470 Ultimo Array
items.description: Provides voidship weapons with targeting data, granting 90% hit chance and 20% critical hit chance.

items.name: Xeno Emitter
items.description:
Whenever the wearer inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} on an enemy, this effect gains +6 additional levels.
This enemy also gains the {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g} effect until the wearer's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

items.name: Xenohide Gloves
items.description: Grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Xenomesh
items.description: Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against xenos enemies.

items.name: Xenopelt Cloak
items.description:
The wearer receives −5 less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}.

items.name: Xenospasm Grenade
items.description: Deals <u>(from 20 to 40)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:PiercingDamage}piercing damage{/g} with 45% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and an additional 30 mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

items.name: Ynnealith
items.description: {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Dodge reduction{/g} against Drukhari and Aeldari is increased by +40%.

items.name: Yrliet's Charm
items.description:
The wearer gains the {g|f:48139b5d8510426fa2d07a55f99236f5}In My Sights{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and provides:
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Additional {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} equal to the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.</indent>
The wearer also gains Aeldari Weapon Proficiency.
items.flavorText: This intricate charm made from wraithbone and minerals unknown to humans is covered in faint Aeldari runes. Yrliet's parting gift.

items.name: Yu'Vath Glass Staff
items.description: Enemies that suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Navigator also gain a damage-over-time effect that deals damage to them at the end of their turn until the end of combat. The damage is equal to 20% of all damage they have suffered from the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (10): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +10 damage to all targets and 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (6): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −6 penalty to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} −15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}

items.name: Zealot
items.description:
Ancient and fearsome weapons captured on the ship of the Archenemy's devotees and cleansed by techsorcism over the course of a seven-year long vigil.
Medium-range broadside {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macro-cannons{/g}, which fire 3 shots, dealing 24 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} per shot.

items.name: Zealot Cloak
items.description: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

items.name: Zero-Sum Lens
items.description: The wearer has a {unit_stat|Resolve}% chance to reduce any incoming damage to 0.

items.name: {name} von Valancius: Item Description
items.description: If the wearer's name is {name} von Valancius, the wearer gains +{uip|Skills|521a28cd898f4d04bfcaf502c3a0fab3} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}.
items.flavorText: "Rogue Trader. Quantity: 1." This document contains an exhaustive list of all conceivable details of your body, attire, and personal traits.
